S06sspp2_4u:1_1: atha khalu śakro devāṇām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:1_2: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ceyaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇanto dhārayanto vācayantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvanta iha dhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇanti sattvāṃś ca paripācayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1_4: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnāḥ yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣanti tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tān yeṣāṃ kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyanti yac ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇvati sa tāvan na vipramuṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1_8: janmasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti parivārasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1_9: prabhāsaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti, cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti svarasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti samādhisaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti dhāraṇīsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti upāyakauśalyena cātmānaṃ buddhavigraham abhinirmāya lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1_10: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anutpādaḥ prādurbhāvo nāsti,
S06sspp2_4u:1_11: te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06sspp2_4u:3_15: samādhīnaṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06sspp2_4u:3_19: mahāmaitryā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, mahākaruṇāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06sspp2_4u:3_21: upāyakauśalyena ca sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti triṣu ca yāneṣu sattvān vinayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:4_0: atha śakro devānām indraḥ punar bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:4_1: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac cedaṃ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:7_0: evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:7_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, prajñāpāramitayā kauśika parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:10_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā yāṅ guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭidhārmikān parigṛhṇāti,
S06sspp2_4u:10_2: tāṃc chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_3: evaṃ bhagavann iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:10_4: bhagavāṃs tam etad avocat: yo hi kaścit kauśika anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājako māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā adhimānikā vā pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vigrahītukāmā bhaviṣyanti vivecayitukamā bhaviṣyanti vivaditukāmā bhaviṣyanti virodhayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukamānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānām utpannotpannā vigrahavivecanavivādavirodhāḥ kṣipram eva punar evāntardhānāt pralayaṃ yāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:10_5: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ te 'bhiprāyā na paripūrayiṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:10_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā,
S06sspp2_4u:10_7: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:10_8: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_9: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauḥśīlyam āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:10_10: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvāḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_11: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsā āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:10_12: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān [ŚsP_II-4_5] dharmān parityajyate sattvāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_13: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:10_14: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_15: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣepam āpadyate,
S06sspp2_4u:10_16: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_17: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:10_18: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvāḥ prajñānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_19: yeṣāṃ kṛte kauśika sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsāranti yad utānuśayaparyutthāne na tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakauśalena,
S06sspp2_4u:10_20: teṣāṃ sattvānām anuśayaparyutthānaṃ vigṛhyate sattvāś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāś caturṣv apramāṇeṣu samādāpitāś catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpitā pañcasv abhijñāsu samādāpitāḥ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu amādāpitāś caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu samādāpitāḥ caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu samāpitāḥ pañcasv indriyeṣu samādāpitāḥ pañcasu baleṣu samādāpitāḥ saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu samādāpitāḥ āryāṣṭāṅge mārge samādāpitāś caturṣv āryasatyeṣu samādāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_21: navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ sarvasamādhiṣu samādāpitāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu samādāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_22: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu samādāpitāḥ caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:10_28: anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ, arhattve pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:11_0: ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā dṛṣṭadhārmikā na guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:11_1: saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvānyathāpratiṣṭhāne pratiṣṭhāpyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati.
S06sspp2_4u:12_0: ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāṃparāyikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:13_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati [ŚsP_II-4_6] yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:13_2: na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā anyatīrthikā vā parivrājakā ādhimānika vā pudgalāḥ śakṣyanty asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vigrahāya vā vivādāya vā virodhāya vāntardhānāya vā parākramitum uttare ca teṣāṃ guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:13_3: yadāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇagrahaṇabhāvanābhir anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:13_4: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika maghinām auṣadhīḥ sarvaviṣapraśamaṇī tatrāśīviṣeṇa vā jantunā vā kṣudhābhibhūtenāhārānveṣiṇā kiṃcid eva prāṇijātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavet.
S06sspp2_4u:13_6: atha tat prāṇakajātaṃ maraṇabhayabhītaṃ yena sā maghī nām' auṣadhis tenopasaṃkrāman tataḥ sa āśīviṣas tasyā auṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvartitavyaṃ manyeta.
S06sspp2_4u:13_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasyā auṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇo yaṃ tasyāśīviṣasya tad viṣam abhibhavaty eva balavatī hi kauśika sā maghī auṣadhiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:14_0: evam eva kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:14_1: tatra kauśika ya utpannotpannā vigrahavivādavirodhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:14_2: te prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā prajñāpāramitāyā balena kṣipram evāntardhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:14_3: upaśamiṣyanti, yato yata evotpatsyante tatra tatraivāntardhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:14_4: na vivardhayiṣyante. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarveṣāṃ pāpakānāṃ dharmāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā yad uta rāgadveṣamohāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā.
S06sspp2_4u:16_1: yāvat kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasyopaśamayitri na vivardhikā,
S06sspp2_4u:20_1: eteṣāṃ kauśika sarvesāṃ mārakāyikānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitopaśamayitrī na vivardhikā,
S06sspp2_4u:20_2: yāvanta kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca devānām indro brahmānaś ca sahāpatiḥ ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāso devāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:20_3: te sarve tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:20_4: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:21_0: sa punar akuśalebhayaś ca dharmebhyaḥ parihāsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:21_2: yad uta dānapāramitayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyate 'nupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:24_1: sa ādeyavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati mitavacanas ca bhaviṣyati na ca vikīrṇavacano bhaviṣyati na krodhābhibhūto bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:25_11: parāṃś ca kāmamithyācāravairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati kāmamithyācāraviramaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:25_15: parāṃś ca mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:27_3: ye cānye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_7: ye cānye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_11: ye cānye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_15: ye cānye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_19: ye cānye mahāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_23: ye cānye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_27: ye cānye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_31: ye cānye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_35: ye cānye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_39: ye cānye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_43: ye cānye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_47: ye cānye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_51: ye cānye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_55: ye cānye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_59: ye cānye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_63: ye cānye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_67: ye cānye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:27_71: ye cānye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:28_1: ātmanā ca sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyate parāṃś ca sarvasamādhisamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:28_3: ye cānye sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:28_7: ye cānye dhāraṇīpratilambhā bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:29_3: ye cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:29_7: ye cānye dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:29_11: ye cānye tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:29_15: ye cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:30_3: ye cānye mahāmaitrī samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:30_7: ye cānye karuṇā samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:30_11: ye cānye muditāṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:30_15: ye cānye upekṣāṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:31_3: ye cānye ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:31_7: ye cānye vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:31_11: ye cānye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati [ŚsP_II-4_15] samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:31_15: ye cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:32_3: ye cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:32_7: ye cānye samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:32_11: ye cānye ṛddhipādān bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:32_15: ye cānye pañcendriyāṇi bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:33_1: sa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dāsyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:33_2: yac chīlaṃ rakṣiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:33_3: yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:33_4: yad vīryaṃ ārapsyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:33_5: yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:33_6: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:34_0: evaṃ carataḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir utpatsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:34_1: saced dānaṃ na dāsyāmi durgateṣu kuleṣūpapatsya na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:34_2: sacet chīlaṃ na rakṣiṣyāmi tisṛṣu me durgatīṣūpapattir bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:34_4: na sattvaparipāko na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:34_6: indriyāṇi me paribhetsyate mukhamaṇḍalaṃ me dhyāmībhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:34_8: yayā rūpasaṃpadayā bodhisattvacārikāḥ carataḥ sattvasahadarśane naiva niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na ca rūpasaṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi na mārgākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:34_9: sacet kusīdo bhaviṣyati nemaṃ śakṣyāmi bodhimārgam anuprāptaṃ na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:34_10: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñataṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:34_11: saced vikṣiptacitto bhaviṣyāmi nedaṃ śaksyāmi samādhim utpādayituṃ yena samādhinā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na me buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsye,
S06sspp2_4u:34_12: saced [ŚsP_II-4_18] duṣprajño bhaviṣyāmi na śakṣyāmi prajñopāyakauśalena śrāvakabhūmipratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:34_13: sa evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣiṣyate, ayuktam etad bhaved yo māṃ mātsaryavaśena dānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena śīlapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vyāpadavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ kauśīdyavaśena vīryapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena prajñāpāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:34_14: aparipūrayan dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:35_0: evaṃ khalu kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikāṃś ca sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilapsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:35_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:36_1: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06sspp2_4u:37_0: bhagavān āha: yathā punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnamārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06sspp2_4u:38_0: śakra āha: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaś ca dānaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_4u:38_1: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaś ca sa kṛpaṇavanīyakārthena yācanakebhyaś ca sa tena dānenānupāyakauśalenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:38_3: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:38_5: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:38_7: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:38_9: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:38_11: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:39_0: smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_1: samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_2: ṛddhipādān bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham ṛddhipādān bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_3: indriyāṇi bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham indriyāṇi bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_4: balāni bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ balāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_5: bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_6: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_7: āryasatyāni bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham āryasatyāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_8: dhyānāni bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_9: apramāṇāni bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham apramāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_10: ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattir bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_11: vimokṣān bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_13: evaṃ bhavaty aham anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_15: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_16: abhijñāṃ bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty aham abhijñāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:39_17: samādhīn bhāvayet, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samādhīn bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
S06sspp2_4u:40_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvadhāraṇīḥ pratilapsye sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_1: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_2: tasyaivaṃ [ŚsP_II-4_20] bhavaty ahaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_3: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidā bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_4: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_5: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_6: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_7: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:40_8: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
S06sspp2_4u:41_0: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikeṣu dharmeṣu caran unnāmaṃ gacchaty ahaṃkārābhiniveśena tasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāya nānunnāmārthāya pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:42_1: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottarāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvān na dāyakam upalabhate na dānam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:42_2: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupashtitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:43_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāc chīlaṃ nopalabhyate śīlaṃ nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:43_1: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:44_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:44_1: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:45_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvād vīryaṃ nopalabhyate vīryavaṃ taṃ nopalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:45_1: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:46_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitā subhāvitatvād dhyānaṃ nopalabhate dhyānaṃ nopalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:46_1: evaṃ khalu bhagavan [ŚsP_II-4_21] bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:47_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt prajñāṃ nopalabhate prajñāṃ nopalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:47_1: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:48_0: sa smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_1: sa samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_2: sa ṛddhipādān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_3: sa indriyāṇi bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_4: sa balāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_5: sa bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_6: sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_7: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:48_8: sa āryasatyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_9: sa dhyānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_11: sa ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_12: sa vimokṣā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsu bhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_14: sa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_16: sa samādhīn bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:48_17: sa dhāraṇīmukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt.
S06sspp2_4u:48_18: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:49_0: sa tathāgatabalāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:49_1: sa vaiśāradyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:49_2: sa pratisaṃvido bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:49_3: sa mahāmaitrīṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:49_4: sa mahākaruṇā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:49_5: sa āveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt.
S06sspp2_4u:49_6: [ŚsP_II-4_22] evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyā prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:50_0: sa sarvajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:50_1: sa mārgākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:50_2: sa sarvākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt.
S06sspp2_4u:50_3: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:52_2: atha khalu bhagavāñ chakro devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:52_3: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati svādhyāpayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:52_4: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, abhirūḍho saṃgrāmamadhye vartamāne mahati saṃgrāmaśīrṣavyārūḍhaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:52_5: tatra sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyann avataret,
S06sspp2_4u:52_6: tatrāvatīrya tiṣṭheta nāsau kulaputro vā kuladuhitā yā parājayaṃ yāsyati,
S06sspp2_4u:52_7: jaya evāsya bhaviṣyaty akṣataś cānupahataś ca taṃ saṃgrāmam uttariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:52_8: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra saṃgrāme samabhirūḍho jīvitāntarāyaṃ nigacchen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06sspp2_4u:52_9: sacet punar asya kaścid eva śastraṃ vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śarīre kṣipet na tasya śarīre patiṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:52_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dīrgharātraṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā,
S06sspp2_4u:52_11: ātmanaś ca rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāni nirjitāni pareṣāṃ rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:52_12: ātmanaś ca dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:52_13: ātmanaś ca mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:52_14: ātmanaś ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:52_15: ātmanaś ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:52_16: ātmanaś cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:52_17: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatāṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:52_18: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya śastrāṇi vā kāṇḍāni vā kṣiptāni śarīre na nipatiṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:53_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:53_2: tasya kaścid abhaiṣajyam avakiret kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadā copanāmayet,
S06sspp2_4u:53_3: śastreṇa vā dadyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake cainaṃ chorayet sarvaṃ tat tasya na kramiṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:53_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:53_5: [ŚsP_II-4_24] niruttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:53_6: atra ca vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇeḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate.
S06sspp2_4u:53_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi so 'tra śikṣamāṇo nātmānam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakaṃ upalabhate na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:57_0: na cakṣurvijñānam upalabhate, na śrotravijñānam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:62_0: na dānapāramitām upalabhate, na śīlapāramitām upalabhate, na kṣāntipāramitām upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:63_3: na mahāśūnyatām upalabhate, na paramārthaśūnyatām upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:64_2: na ṛddhipādān upalabhate, nendriyāṇy upalabhate, na balāny upalabhate, na bodhyaṅgāny upalabhate, nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:64_3: nāryasatyāny upalabhate, na dhyānāny upalabhate, nāpramāṇāny upalabhate, na ārūpyasamāpattīr upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:64_6: nābhijñā upalabhate, na samādhīn upalabhate, na dhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:64_8: na vaiśāradyāny upalabhate, na pratisaṃvida upalabhate, na mahāmaitrīm upalabhate, na mahākaruṇām upalabhate, nāveṇikabuddhadharmān upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:65_2: nānāgāmiphalam upalabhate, nārhattvam upalabhate, na pratyekabodhim upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:66_0: anupalambhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06sspp2_4u:66_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06sspp2_4u:66_4: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:66_5: ye 'pi te etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:66_6: te 'py atraiva vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:67_2: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyate udgṛhīṣyati na svādhyāpayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyate na yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:67_3: na punar tatra gṛhe vā grāme vā nagare vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣāvatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:67_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārthāya ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrā yāmā devaputrāḥ tuṣitā devaputrā nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavasavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā devaputrā brahmapurohitā devaputrā brahmapārṣadyā devaputrā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devāḥ apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā ye 'py aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrāḥ yāmā devaputrās tuṣitā devaputrā nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:67_6: te ca devaputrā āgatyaināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā gamiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:67_7: yaḥ kaścit kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati tasyeme dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:67_8: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍe gatā bodhimaṇḍasya ca parisāmantagate na bodhimaṇḍasya cābhyantare tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinā manuṣyabhūtā vā na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā.
S06sspp2_4u:67_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi niṣadya taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā.
S06sspp2_4u:67_10: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atraiva niṣadyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:67_11: ye 'pi te etarhi daśasu dikṣu [ŚsP_II-4_27] lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti te 'py atraiva niṣadyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:67_12: taiḥ sarvatathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvasattvānām abhayāyāvairāyāsapannāya pratipadyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā devamānuṣīṣu saṃpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyante pratiṣṭhāpyante ca,
S06sspp2_4u:67_18: tat kasya hetoḥ? anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sa pṛthivīpradeśe sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūtaḥ kṛto vandanīyo namaskaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyaḥ puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:68_1: śakra āha: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06sspp2_4u:68_2: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhāraya tāṃ ca puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
S06sspp2_4u:68_3: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamayastūpe tathāgataśarīrāni pratiṣṭhāpayet parihared vā saptaratnamaye samudgate kṛtvā tāni ca satkuryād gurukurād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:69_0: bhagavān āha: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pariprakṣyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:69_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā yaś cāyam ātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:69_3: katamasyāṃ pratipati śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatānuprāptā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:70_0: śakra āha: ihaiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:71_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśika evam etat, atra mayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_28] śikṣamāṇena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:71_4: saṃkhyāṃ gacchati, yeyaṃ kauśika sarvākārajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā niryātā,
S06sspp2_4u:71_5: evam ayaṃ kauśikātmabhāvas tasya sarvākarajñatājñānasyāśrayabhūta imaṃ cāśrayaṃ niśritya tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā evaṃ tasya sarvākārajñatājñānasyāyam ātmabhāva āśrayabhūtasarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyo mānanīyo pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ parinivṛtasyāpi ca kauśika śarīrāny evaṃ śarīrapūjā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:71_6: na tv anyathadharmapūjāḥ yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:71_7: puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ sarvākārajñatājñānasya tena pūjākṛto bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:71_8: tasmāt tarhi kauśika śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgataṃ pūjayitukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā likhitvodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:71_9: satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ yaś ca kauśika tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamayastūpaiḥ śarīraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06sspp2_4u:71_10: saptaratnamaye vā samugate kṛtvā pariharet tataś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tāṃ ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:71_11: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:71_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato niryātā hi kauśika pañcapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:72_0: ato niryātā adhyātmaśūnyatā, ato niryātā bahirdhāśūnyatā, ato niryātā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:72_1: ato niryātā śūnyatāśūnyatā, ato niryātā mahāśūnyatā, ato niryātā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:72_2: ato niryātā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā, ato niryātā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:72_3: ato niryātā atyantaśūnyatā, ato niryātā anavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:72_5: ato niryātā prakṛtiśūnyatā, [ŚsP_II-4_29] ato niryātā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:72_8: ato niryātā abhāvaśūnyatā, ato niryātā svabhāvaśūnyatā, ato niryātā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_4u:73_3: ato niryātāni pañcendriyāṇi, ato niryātāni pañcabalāni, ato niryātāni saptabodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_4u:73_9: ato niryātā aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ, ato niryātā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:73_11: ato niryātāni pañcābhijñāḥ, ato niryātāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:73_16: ato niryātā mahākaruṇā, ato niryātā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā,
S06sspp2_4u:73_20: ato niryātā rūpasaṃpat, ato niryātā lābhasaṃpat, ato niryātā parivārasaṃpat, ato niryātā mahāmaitrī, ato niryātā mahākaruṇā, ato niryātāni kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni,
S06sspp2_4u:74_2: ato niryātā yāmā devaputrā, ato niryātās tuṣitā devaputrā,
S06sspp2_4u:74_9: ato niryātā ābhā devā, ato niryātā parīttabhā devā, ato niryātā apramāṇābhā devā,
S06sspp2_4u:74_10: ato niryātā ābhāsvarā devā, ato niryātāḥ subhā devā, ato niryātāḥ parīttaśubhā devā,
S06sspp2_4u:74_13: ato niryātā bṛhā devā, ato niryātāḥ parīttabṛhā devā,
S06sspp2_4u:75_0: ato niryātāḥ srotaāpannā, ato niryātāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ, ato niryātā anāgāminaḥ, ato niryātā arhantaḥ, ato niryātāḥ pratyekabuddhāh,
S06sspp2_4u:75_3: ato niryātās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_4u:76_1: śakra āha: ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na satkurvanti na gurukurvanti na mānayanti na pūjayanti tat kiṃ te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā na jānanty eva mahārdhikā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākṛtā bhavati?
S06sspp2_4u:77_0: bhagavān āha. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye dharma abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:77_1: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣā saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:77_2: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:78_0: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā,
S06sspp2_4u:78_2: ye dharme abhedyaprasādena samanvāgato ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:78_3: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅksāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:78_4: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatā saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatā.
S06sspp2_4u:79_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_1: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_2: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_3: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_4: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_5: kiyantas te jambūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_6: kiyantas te jāmbūdvipakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_7: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_8: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_9: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_10: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:79_11: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:80_0: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinas [ŚsP_II-4_31] tato 'lpakā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye na vānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:80_3: tato 'lpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannās tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām acalabhāgīyānā saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ prahāṇād arhatas tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:80_4: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:81_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etad 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:82_0: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:82_1: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:82_2: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:82_3: tato 'lpatarakā ye srotaāpannās tato 'lpatarakā ye sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye anāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye 'rhantaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitās tato 'lpatarakā ye 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye caranti.
S06sspp2_4u:82_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi pūrvantaiḥ saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ na buddhādṛṣṭo na dharmaśrana saṃghaḥ paryupāsito na dānaṃ dattaṃ na śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ na kṣāntiṃ bhāvitā na vīryam ālabdhaṃ na dhyānāni bhāvitāni na prajñā bhāvitā,
S06sspp2_4u:85_14: nābhijñāḥ śrutā na bhāvitā, na samādhayaḥ śrutā na bhāvitā,
S06sspp2_4u:86_0: tad anena te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:86_1: alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā sattvā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dharme abhedyprasādena samanvāgatā saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:86_7: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:86_8: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadvesamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:86_9: tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:86_10: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:86_12: tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye athyāsayena caranti niṣṭhatu kauśika manuṣyāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:86_13: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika kiyanto jāmbūdvīpe prāṇināye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye navānām [ŚsP_II-4_33] anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr lābhino ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:87_0: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāmino ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:87_2: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ kiyants te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niṣkāṅkṣā buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye mātṛjñāḥ ye pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ kule jyeṣṭopacāyakā dānāni dadati śīlaṃ rakṣanti kṣāntipoṣadham upavaśanti,
S06sspp2_4u:87_4: evam anityasaṃjñinaḥ, anātmasaṃjñino 'śucisaṃjñinaḥ sarvalokeṣv anabhirati saṃjñanaḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:88_1: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:88_9: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:88_10: ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:88_11: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitā alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:89_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśika evam etat, tathā yathā vadasi, alpakās te kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:89_3: ye navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:89_6: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmino ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:90_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:90_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:90_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:91_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhatuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:91_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhante yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:91_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:92_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:92_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:92_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:93_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:93_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:93_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:94_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadlvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:94_1: prajñāparamitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:94_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? [ŚsP_II-4_35] durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:95_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:95_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:95_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:96_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:96_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:96_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:97_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:97_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:97_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:98_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:98_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:98_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:99_0: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye caranti,
S06sspp2_4u:99_1: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhate yad bhūyastvena [ŚsP_II-4_36] śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
S06sspp2_4u:99_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśikānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:100_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika ye te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās taiḥ kṣipraṃ sukhaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukamair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhīkṣaṇaṃ srotavyodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:100_1: yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya yoniśaś ca manasikṛtvā,
S06sspp2_4u:101_0: tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:102_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_4u:103_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ catvāry āryasatyāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni pañcābhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ mahāmaitri mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:104_0: anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā yatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā te py udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:104_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ jñāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:104_2: atra hi tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ śikṣito yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:105_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām atyantaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyām anupalambhaśūnyatāyām abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_37] svabhāvaśūnyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:106_0: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañceṣv indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge mārge caturṣv āryasatyeṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
S06sspp2_4u:107_0: asmābhir apy anuśikṣitavyam eṣāsmākaṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:107_1: yāvad anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā etad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ pratyekabuddhānām arhatām anāgāmināṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ srotaāpannānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā.
S06sspp2_4u:108_2: śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā, mahāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā, paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā,
S06sspp2_4u:109_0: smṛtyupasthāneṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, samyakprahāṇeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, ṛddhipādeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, indriyeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, baleṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, bodhyaṅgeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, āryāṣṭāṅge mārge śikṣamāṇāḥ, āryasatyeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, dhyāneṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, apramāṇeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, ārūpyasamāpattiṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:109_3: abhijñāsu śikṣamāṇāḥ, samādhiṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, dhāraṇīmukheṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, tathāgatabaleṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, vaiśāradyeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ, pratisaṃvitsu śikṣamāṇāḥ, mahāmaitryāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ, mahākaruṇāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ, āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu śikṣamāṇāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:109_6: buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhā arhanto 'nāgāminaḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ srotaāpannāḥ pāraṅgatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti ca.
S06sspp2_4u:110_1: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tiṣṭhati tathāgataparinirvṛte vā tathāgate,
S06sspp2_4u:110_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:110_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika dhyānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:110_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika vīryapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:110_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika kṣāntipāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurayāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:110_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika śīlapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:110_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika dānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratisaraṇam.
S06sspp2_4u:111_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika bahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ.
S06sspp2_4u:111_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika śūnyatāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika mahāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika paramārthaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika saṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika atyantaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_19: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika anavarāgraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_21: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika anavakāraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_25: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_27: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_29: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikānupalambhaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_31: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikābhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇam,
S06sspp2_4u:111_33: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika svabhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:111_35: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśikābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇam.
S06sspp2_4u:112_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika samyakprahāṇāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika ṛddhipādāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśikendriyāṇi sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika balāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika bodhyaṅgāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣa eva kauśikāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ [ŚsP_II-4_41] yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśikāryasatyāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaranaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika dhyānāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_19: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśikāpramāṇāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_21: tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika vimokṣāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_25: tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśikānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyālḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_27: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_29: tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśikābhijñā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_31: tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika samādhayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_33: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika dhāraṇīmukhāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_35: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika [ŚsP_II-4_42] tathāgatabalāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_37: tat kasya hetoḥ? etāny eva kauśika vaiśāradyāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_39: tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_41: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika mahākaruṇā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_43: tat kasya hetoḥ? eta eva kauśika āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_45: tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika sarvajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_47: tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika mārgākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:112_49: tat kasya hetoḥ? etā eva kauśika sarvākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratisaraṇam.
S06sspp2_4u:113_1: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kārayed yojanamuccaitvenārdhayojanaṃ vistareṇāyāṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ divyaiś puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyair vādyaiḥ satkuryā gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet.
S06sspp2_4u:113_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:114_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:115_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ [ŚsP_II-4_43] puṇyaṃ prasavati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:115_1: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyaty uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:116_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśikaikaḥ stūpaḥ sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataparinirvṛte,
S06sspp2_4u:116_1: imaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūraye yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistātais tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:116_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:117_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:118_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06sspp2_4u:118_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:118_3: uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:119_1: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ cāturmahādvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjayaiḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:119_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:120_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:121_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:121_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:121_2: likhitvā nu satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair [ŚsP_II-4_44] gandhair vilepanaiś curṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:122_1: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ cūḍikaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:122_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:123_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:124_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:124_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:124_3: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:125_1: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ madhyamaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca yāvat kṣīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:125_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:126_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:127_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:127_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:127_3: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:128_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:128_1: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte [ŚsP_II-4_45] pūjāyai imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyair saptaratnamayais tathāgatacaityaiḥ paripūjayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:128_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:129_1: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:130_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:130_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:130_3: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:131_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇo ye kecit kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayet tāṃ ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:131_1: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:131_3: tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:131_4: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:132_0: śakra āha: evam etad bhagavan evam etat sugata prajñāpāramitā bhagavan satkurvadbhiḥ gurukurvadbhir mānayadbhiḥ pūjayadbhir atītānagatapratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānito pūjito bhavanti,
S06sspp2_4u:133_0: yāvantaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair [ŚsP_II-4_46] divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:134_0: yāvanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:135_0: yāvantaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:136_0: yāvanta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:137_0: yāvanta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccaistve nārdhayojanaṃ vistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:138_0: yāvantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:139_1: yāvanto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:140_0: yāvantaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:141_0: yāvanto 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:142_0: yāvanta upariṣṭhād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:142_1: tat kiṃ manyase? bhagavan api nu sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:144_0: śakra āha: ataḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06sspp2_4u:144_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S06sspp2_4u:144_2: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:144_3: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:144_4: tat [ŚsP_II-4_48] kasya hetoḥ? atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām antargatāḥ sarve kuśalā dharmās tad yathā daśa kuśalaḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:145_0: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:146_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_4u:147_0: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:147_1: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitā catvāry āryasatyāni duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhanirodhā mārgaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā aṣṭā vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvākārajñatā idaṃ tad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ yatra sarvaśrāvkapratyekabuddhānām atitānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ śikṣitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṅgatā gacchati gamiṣyati ca.
S06sspp2_4u:149_2: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānāṃ indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:149_3: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, bahu te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyaty aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam acintyam atulyam aparimāṇaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:149_4: uttare ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:149_5: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:149_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā prajñāpāramitāniryātā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā vīryapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā kṣāntipāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā śīlapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā dānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā.
S06sspp2_4u:152_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputrā vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:152_1: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair asya kauśika puṇyābhisaṃskārasyāsau pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyam api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśam api na kṣamate.
S06sspp2_4u:152_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? yāvat kileyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāṃbūdvīpe sthāsyati.
S06sspp2_4u:152_3: tāvan na buddharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na dharmaratnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃgharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:152_4: tāvad daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:158_1: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavasavartinā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmaṇo ābhāḥ parīttabhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devās taṃ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate :
S06sspp2_4u:158_2: udgṛhītavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā vācayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā paryavāptavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:158_4: etayā mārṣa prajñāpāramitayodgṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā [ŚsP_II-4_53] vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā avyavacchedo bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:158_6: saṃghanetryā avyavacchedo bhaviṣyati buddhanetryā mārṣa avyavacchedo 'nudharmanetryā avyavacchedo 'nusaṃghanetryā avyavacchedaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:163_1: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
S06sspp2_4u:163_2: udgṛhāṇa tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśaś ca manasikuruṣvemāṃ prajñāpāramitām.
S06sspp2_4u:163_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? yadā kauśikāsurāṇām evaṃ samudācārā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:163_4: devāṃs trāyastriṃśān yodhayiṣyāmo devais trāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāmas tadā tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhṛtya manasā svadhyāya kuryāḥ yoniśaś ca manasikuryā evaṃ teṣām asurāṇāṃ te samudācārāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:164_0: punar evāntarddhāsyati na punas te cittotpādā vivardhiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:164_1: yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ cyutikālaḥ syāṃ te cātmanaḥ pāpopapattiṃ paśyeyus teṣāṃ tvaṃ kauśika purataḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās te tena prajñāpāramitā śravaṇakuśalamūlena prajñāpāranutā prasādena ca tatraiva devabhavaneṣūpapatsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:164_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? evaṃ mahārthikā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā śravaṇaṃ yasya kasyacit kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotāvabhāsaṃ gamiṣyanti sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:164_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvan atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīhaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:164_4: ye 'pi ta etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:164_5: sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:164_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikātra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve bodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā.
S06sspp2_4u:165_0: śakra āha: mahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā asamasameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:165_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan [ŚsP_II-4_55] prajñāpāramitā sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dhārayitrī.
S06sspp2_4u:166_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
