S06sspp2_4u:166_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās ta etāṃ vidyām āgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py etām eva vidyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:166_3: ye 'pi ta etarhi daśa dig lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:166_4: te 'py etām eva vidyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā.
S06sspp2_4u:166_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikemāṃ vidyām āgamya daśakuśalā karmapathāḥ loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:167_0: dānapāramitā loke prajñāyate, śīlapāramitā loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:168_4: mahāśūnyatā loke prajñāyate, paramārthaśūnyatā loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:169_2: ṛddhipādā loke prajñāyante, indriyāṇi loke prajñāyante, balāni loke prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:169_5: dhyānāni loke prajñāyante, apramāṇāni loke prajñāyante, ārūpyasamāpattayo loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:169_6: vimokṣā loke prajñāyante, anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:169_8: abhijñā loke prajñāyante, samādhayo loke prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:169_12: mahākaruṇā loke prajñāyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmā loke prajñāyante.
S06sspp2_4u:169_14: bhūtakoṭir loke prajñāyate, tathatā loke prajñāyate, avitathatā loke prajñāyate, ananyatathatā loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:169_15: dharmatā loke prajñāyate, dharmasthititā loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:169_21: arhattvaṃ loke prajñāyate, pratyekabodhir loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:169_22: sarvajñatā loke prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:169_24: bodhisattvam api kauśikāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prabhāṣyante.
S06sspp2_4u:172_2: ṛddhipādā loke prabhāvyante, indriyāṇi loke prabhāvyante, balāni loke prabhāvyante, bodhyaṅgāni loke prabhāvyante,
S06sspp2_4u:172_5: dhyānāni loke prabhāvyante, apramāṇāni loke prabhāvyante,
S06sspp2_4u:172_7: vimokṣā loke prabhāvyante, anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo loke prabhāvyante,
S06sspp2_4u:172_9: abhijñāḥ loke prabhāvyante, samādhayo loke prabhāvyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni loke prabhāvyante,
S06sspp2_4u:172_13: mahākaruṇā loke prabhāvyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmā loke prabhāvyante,
S06sspp2_4u:172_14: sarvajñatā loke prabhāvyate, mārgākārajñatā loke prabhāvyate,
S06sspp2_4u:172_17: sakṛdāgāmī loke prabhāvyate, anāgāmī loke prabhāvyate, arhan loke prabhāvyate, pratyekabuddho loke prabhāvyate,
S06sspp2_4u:173_0: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvoṣadhitārānakṣatrāṇi prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:173_1: evam eva kauśika bodhisattvacandramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvakuśalacaryāsamyakcaryādaśakuśalakarmapathadhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāpāramitāśūnyatābodhipakṣadharmaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāryasatyavimokṣānupūrvavihārasamāpattisamādhidhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmādhayaḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:174_0: yadāpi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke notpādo bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:174_1: tadāpi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvebhyo laukikalokottarān dharmān deśayanti.
S06sspp2_4u:174_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaniryātā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhamahāyānāni,
S06sspp2_4u:174_3: tac ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ prajñāpāramitāniryātaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:174_4: yenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06sspp2_4u:175_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ carati, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06sspp2_4u:175_1: śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ carati, mahāśūnyatāyāṃ carati, paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ carati, anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ carati, prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ carati, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06sspp2_4u:175_3: abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati.
S06sspp2_4u:176_0: smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati. samyakprahāṇeṣu carati, ṛddhipādeṣu carati, indriyeṣu carati, baleṣu carati, bodhyaṅgeṣu carati, āryāṣṭāṅge marge carati, āryasatyeṣu carati, dhyāneṣu carati, apramāṇeṣu carati, ārūpyasamāpattiṣu carati, aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu carati, navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu [ŚsP_II-4_58] carati,
S06sspp2_4u:176_2: abhijñāsu carati, samādhiṣu carati, dhāraṇīmukheṣu carati, tathāgatabaleṣu carati, vaiśāradyeṣu carati, pratisaṃvitsu carati, mahākaruṇāyāṃ carati, aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati.
S06sspp2_4u:176_3: na ca śrāvakabhūmau patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmisākṣāt karoti,
S06sspp2_4u:176_4: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06sspp2_4u:176_5: āyuḥsaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti sattvasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti buddhakṣetrasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti,
S06sspp2_4u:177_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:177_2: sa ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:178_0: śakra āha: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:178_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:179_0: bhagavān āha: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:179_2: na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati, nāgninā kālaṃ kariṣyati, nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati, yāvan naikottareṇa rāgaśatena kālaṃ kariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:179_4: ye ca puna rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:179_5: sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:179_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tad asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejonubhāvena sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:179_10: tam enaṃ te rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā priyavacanair ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:179_11: ābhāṣitavyaṃ maṃsyate, pratisaṃmoditavyaṃ maṃsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:179_12: ebhiḥ kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā [ŚsP_II-4_59] kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:180_0: katamaiś ca kauśika sāṃparāyikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:180_1: yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ karmapathair avirahitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:180_2: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:180_3: na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir na smṛtyupasthānair na samyakprahāṇair na ṛddhipādair nendriyair na balair na bodhyaṅgair na mārgeṇa nāryasatyair na dhyānair nāpramāṇair nārūpyasamāpattibhir na vimokṣair nānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhair nābhijñābhir na samādhibhir na dhāraṇīmukhair na tathāgatabalair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāveṇikabuddhadharmair virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:180_5: na tiryagyonau na yamaloke, anyatra praṇidhānavaśena sattvaṃ paripākaṃ kariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:180_8: veṇukarakule vā puṣkasakule vā mauṣṭhikacaṇḍālaurānikasaukārikakuleṣu vā śūdrakuleṣu vā satatasamitaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:180_9: yatra ca lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti tatra lokadhātuṣūpapatsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:180_12: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya sa buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:180_14: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā imāṃ guṇasaṃpadām ākāṅkṣadbhir iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:180_16: ta ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikaiḥ sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:182_2: athānyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmaṃ nyāsīt.
S06sspp2_4u:183_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūd,
S06sspp2_4u:183_1: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma,
S06sspp2_4u:183_2: ya nv ahaṃ yāvan mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt,
S06sspp2_4u:183_3: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā udgṛhītaṃ tat svādhyāyaṃ kuryāṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:183_4: yadi me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakām upasaṃkramya bhagavato 'ntarāyaṃ ca kuryuḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:184_0: atha śakro devānām indro yāvad bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyām udgṛhītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma.
S06sspp2_4u:185_0: atha te 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavataṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
S06sspp2_4u:185_1: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:186_1: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yena me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:187_0: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataś chāradvatīputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:187_1: parivitarkam ājāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayataḥ śakreṇa sāradvatīputra devānām indreṇeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā tenaite 'nyatīrthikacarakaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ tāṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
S06sspp2_4u:187_2: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:187_3: na hi śāradvatīputra eṣām anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklāṅgaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:187_4: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā imāṃ parṣadam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃyante nāhaṃ taṃ śāradvatīputra samanupaśyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:187_5: sadevaloke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratihatacitto vā upārambhābhiprāyo vā upasaṃkramen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:187_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāradvatīputra ya iha trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmaṇa ābhaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubbā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā anabhrakā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:187_7: ye ca śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi [ŚsP_II-4_61] bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:187_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te prajñāpāramitā niryātāḥ sarvam.
S06sspp2_4u:188_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:188_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:189_0: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:189_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:190_0: ye 'pi te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:190_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:191_0: ye 'pi te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:191_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:192_0: ye 'pi te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:192_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:193_0: ye 'pi te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:193_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:194_0: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā [ŚsP_II-4_62] devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:194_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:195_0: ye 'pi te paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:195_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:196_0: ye 'pi te adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:196_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
S06sspp2_4u:197_0: ye 'pi te upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyam prajñāpāramitānugṛhītā.
S06sspp2_4u:197_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve.
S06sspp2_4u:198_1: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyas etad abhūd,
S06sspp2_4u:198_2: imās tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā ime ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devāḥ saṃmukhībhūtā niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākariṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:198_3: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ya nv ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrameyaṃ vicakṣuṣ karaṇīya.
S06sspp2_4u:199_0: atha māra pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyam abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmo 'bhūt.
S06sspp2_4u:200_1: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃ caturaṅgabalakāyam abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:200_2: yaś cāyaṃ mārapāpīyāñ caturaṅgabalakāyasya vyūho nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūho na rājñaḥ prasenajito na sākyānāṃ na licchavīnāṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpavyūhaḥ yo 'yaṃ caturaṅgo varakāyo māreṇa pāpiyasā nirmitaḥ dīrgharātraṃ khalu punar mārapāpīyān bhagavato 'vatārasaṃprekṣyāvatāragaveṣī samyakprayuktānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:200_3: ya nv aham imāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_63] prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā ca svādhyāyaṃ kuryāt.
S06sspp2_4u:201_0: atha śakro devānām indra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharati sma,
S06sspp2_4u:201_2: yathā yathā śakro devānām indra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma,
S06sspp2_4u:201_3: tathā tathā mārapāpīyāṃs tenaiva mārgeṇa tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva pratyudāvartate sma.
S06sspp2_4u:202_0: atha tatra parṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te divyāni puṣpāṇi vāsāṃsi cābhinirmāya vaihāyasy antarikṣe sthitvaiva yena bhagavāṃs tenākṣipanti sma,
S06sspp2_4u:202_2: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta, ciraṃ bateyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhagavatāṃ yāvat kileyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakān manuṣyān prajñāpāramitānuvartiṣyante tāvan na tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati saddharmasya ca cirasthitikatāṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:202_5: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā kuladuhitaro vā likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā ālokajātā ca sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavyā sanāthāvigatās tamondhakārā ca me sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavya.
S06sspp2_4u:203_1: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indrakāṃś cākaniṣṭhaparyato devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:203_2: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, evam etad devaputrā evam etat,
S06sspp2_4u:203_3: yāvad imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā anuvartiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:203_4: tāvat tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati saddharmasya ca cirasthitikatā bhaviṣyati saṃgharatnasya ca loke prajñāyate yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yāvat samanto daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatasyārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:203_8: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā kuladuhitaro vā likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā ālokajātā ca sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavyā sanāthāvigatās tamondhakārā ca me sā dik pratibhāti.
S06sspp2_4u:204_0: atha te devaputrā punar api divyāni kusumāni abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenābhiprakiranti sma,
S06sspp2_4u:204_1: evañ ca vācam abhāṣanta, yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati [ŚsP_II-4_64] dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas manasikariśyati.
S06sspp2_4u:204_2: na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprakṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:204_3: vayam api bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:204_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? śāstāram eva bhagavaṃs tam asya mahāśāstāram anyataraṃ vā yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S06sspp2_4u:205_0: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:205_1: na te bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitaro vā avarakena kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:205_2: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S06sspp2_4u:205_3: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati, sarvajinamanasikārās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:205_4: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:205_5: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāś ca te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:205_6: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāś ca te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:205_7: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:205_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā gaveṣitavyā yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:205_9: ataś ca punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā gaveṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:205_10: yad uta sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānyā prajñāpāramitānyā sarvākārajñatānyā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca sarvākārajñatā nānyādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:206_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat prajñāpāramitāniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_4u:206_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika nānyā prajñāpāramitānyā sarvākārajñatā nānyā sarvākārajñatānyā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca sarvākārajñatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:208_2: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:208_3: na tathā bhagavān dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06sspp2_4u:209_0: na tathā bhagavān adhyātmaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06sspp2_4u:210_19: na tathā daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06sspp2_4u:210_20: na tatha caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06sspp2_4u:210_21: na tathā catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06sspp2_4u:210_24: na tathāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06sspp2_4u:211_0: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitā ānandaḥ pūrvāṅgamā pariṇāyikā yad uta pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśānāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:211_1: āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnām aṣṭāṇāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām abhijñānāṃ samādhīnāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśatathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyā aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām.
S06sspp2_4u:211_2: tat kiṃ manyase? ānandāpariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:213_0: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati?
S06sspp2_4u:215_0: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati?
S06sspp2_4u:217_0: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati?
S06sspp2_4u:219_0: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati?
S06sspp2_4u:221_0: bhagavān āha: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ prajñāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavati?
S06sspp2_4u:222_1: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. api tu khalu punaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan śīlapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan vīryapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan dhyānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati? kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavati?
S06sspp2_4u:223_0: bhagavān āha: advayayogenānanda pariṇāmitaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:223_1: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:223_2: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitā kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:223_3: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:223_4: anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:223_5: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:223_6: advayayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:224_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena? kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_68] prajñāpāramitā bhavati? katham anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena?
S06sspp2_4u:233_0: dānapāramitāyā advayayogena, śīlapāramitāyā advayayogena, kṣāntipāramitāyā advayayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:235_2: ṛddhipādānām advayayogena, indriyāṇām advayayogena, balānām advayayogena, bodhyaṅgānām advayayogena, āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyādvayayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:235_3: āryasatyānām advayayogena, dhyānānām advayayogena, apramāṇānām advayayogena, ārūpyasamāpattīnām advayayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:235_6: abhijñānām advayayogena, samādhīnām advayayogena, dhāraṇīmukhānām advayayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:235_10: mahāmaitryā advayayogena, mahākaruṇāyā advayayogena, aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām advayayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:235_13: anāgāmiphalasyādvayayogena, arhattvasyādvayayogena, pratyekabodher advayayogena, anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher advayayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:238_0: kathaṃ rūpasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ śabdasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ gandhasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ rasasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ sparśasyādvayayogena, kathaṃ dharmāṇām advayayogena?

S06sspp2_4u:257_1: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā sarvaśūnyatānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgama aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā abhijñānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā samādhīnāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_77] prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā,
S06sspp2_4u:258_0: tad yathāpi nāmānanda mahāpṛthivyāṃ bījāni prakīrṇāni sāmāgrī labhamānāni virohanti mahāpṛthivyāṃ ca teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāpṛthivī pratiṣṭhitāni tāni bījāni prarohanti.
S06sspp2_4u:258_1: evam eva prajñāpāramitā pratiṣṭhā imā pañcapāramitā virohanti.
S06sspp2_4u:259_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā virohati, bahirdhāśūnyatā virohati, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā virohati,

S06sspp2_4u:260_0: smṛtyupasthānāni virohanti, samyakprahāṇāni virohanti, ṛddhipādā virohanti, indriyāṇi virohanti, balāni virohanti, bodhyaṅgāni virohanti, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo virohati, āryasatyāni virohanti, dhyānāni virohanti, apramāṇāni virohanti, ārūpyasamāpattayo virohanti, aṣṭau vimokṣā virohanti, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo virohanti,

S06sspp2_4u:260_5: mahāmaitri virohati, mahākaruṇā virohati, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā virohanti,
S06sspp2_4u:262_0: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitaivāsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pariṇāyikā,
S06sspp2_4u:262_5: pañcānāṃ balānāṃ pariṇāyikā, saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ pariṇāyikā,
S06sspp2_4u:262_14: abhijñānāṃ pariṇāyikā, samādhīnāṃ pariṇāyikā, dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ pariṇāyikā, daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ pariṇāyikā,
S06sspp2_4u:262_17: mahāmaitryāḥ pariṇāyikā, mahākaruṇāyāḥ pariṇāyikā, aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ pariṇāyikā,
S06sspp2_4u:263_1: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:263_2: na me bhagavan tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve [ŚsP_II-4_79] guṇāḥ parikīrtitā ye mayā bhagavato 'ntikād udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitāyān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhīṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan ye mayā bhagavato 'ntikād asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇā udgṛhītāḥ paryavāptā dhāritā vācitāḥ pravartitāḥ prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:267_22: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:268_0: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:269_2: yāmā devā loke prajñāyante, tuṣitā devā loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:269_13: śubhā devā loke prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devā loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:269_16: bṛhā devā loke prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devā loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:269_19: abṛhā devā loke prajñāyante, atapā devā loke prajñāyante, sudṛśā devā loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:270_0: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā srotaāpannā loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:270_2: anāgāmino loke prajñāyante, arhanto loke prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhā loke prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:270_4: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:271_2: bhagavān āha: na punaḥ kauśika yena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītā bhaviṣyati dhāritā bhaviṣyati vācitā bhaviṣyati paryavāptā bhaviṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā bhaviṣyati tasyemām eva guṇān vadāmi.
S06sspp2_4u:272_2: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhītā bhaviṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:273_0: apramāṇena samādhiskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:273_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:274_0: apramāṇena prajñāskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:274_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:275_0: apramāṇena vimuktiskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:275_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:276_0: apramāṇena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:276_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:277_0: tathāgatapratipannās te kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:278_0: yaś ca kauśika sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktaskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho yaś ca teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:278_1: asya kauśika śīlaskandhasya samādhiskandhasya prajñāskandhasya vimuktiskandhasya vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhasya [ŚsP_II-4_82] purataḥ sa sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kālāṃ nopaiti,
S06sspp2_4u:278_4: koṭītamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti, koṭīśatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06sspp2_4u:278_8: gaṇanām api kalāṃ nopaiti, upamām api kalāṃ nopaiti, upaniśām api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ na ca kaścid dharma ājñātaḥ ye punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:278_9: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tāṃ ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:278_10: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyas teṣām apy ahaṃ kulaputraṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ tataś cetad evemāṃ dṛṣṭadhārmikān sā parāyikāṃś ca guṇāṃ vadāmi.
S06sspp2_4u:279_0: śakra āha: aham api bhagavan tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:279_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:279_2: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvākārajñatācittena imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā satkariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:279_3: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:280_0: bhagavān āha: tasya punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svadhyāyamānasya,
S06sspp2_4u:280_2: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayatas te devaputrāḥ pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:280_3: yad api te dharmabhānakānam atrāpi tu kāmā bhavanti,
S06sspp2_4u:280_4: tat tenaiva dharmagauravena devaputrāḥ pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:280_5: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaguṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:280_6: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyaty enāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:280_7: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair [ŚsP_II-4_83] dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:281_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamānasya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ purato 'nācalayatā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:281_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyati.
S06sspp2_4u:281_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā abhinnā laukikā lokottaraś ca sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca sādhāraṇāś ca kuśalāś cākusalāś ca saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca śrāvakadharmāś ca pratyekabuddhadharmāś ca bodhisattvadharmāś ca buddhadharmāś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:281_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy eṣā sarvaṃ kuśaladharmāṇāṃ nidhiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:281_5: sa ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06sspp2_4u:282_3: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'tyantaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'navarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'navakāraśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:282_7: sa aupalabhike sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_4u:282_8: yo 'py upālabhate, tam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_4u:282_9: yo 'py upālabhate tam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_4u:282_10: evaṃ khalu taṃ kulaputraṃ vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā prajñāpāramitayodgṛhītayā na kaścid upālapsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:283_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvataś cittaṃ nācaleṣyate notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsam āpatsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:283_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vastu na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_4u:283_2: yo 'valīyeta vā saṃlīyeta vā uttrasyed vā saṃtrasyed vā saṃtrāsam āpadyed vā,
S06sspp2_4u:283_3: imāṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhīṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:283_4: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:283_5: tāñ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:283_6: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:284_2: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:284_3: tāñ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:284_4: pūjayiṣyati, puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:284_5: sa priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṝṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ rājñāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ śravaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāś cārhantaś cānāgāminaś ca sakṛdāgāminaś ca srotaāpannāś ca teṣām api sa priyo bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:284_6: manāpaś ca sadevasya lokasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ priyo bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:284_7: manāpaś ca anācchedya pratibhānaś ca bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:288_0: anācchedyā cāsya sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyaty anācchedyā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir bhaviṣyaty anācchedyā cāsya sarvākārajñatā bhaviṣyati pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati purataḥ utpannotpannānāṃ pratyanuyogānāṃ sahadharmeṇa niḥśaraṇe imān api sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhiṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś manasikariṣyaty avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatācittena tāṃś ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:289_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:289_1: tatra kauśika ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇa ābhāḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubbāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:289_2: bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:289_3: te tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:289_4: ye 'pi te śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:289_5: te 'pi tatrāgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06sspp2_4u:290_1: tatra kauśika ye daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇa abhāḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā devā anuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:290_2: ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā,
S06sspp2_4u:290_3: ye 'pi tadanye mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te tatrāgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06sspp2_4u:291_0: tatra kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:291_1: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu lokadhatuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇa devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:291_2: bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā,
S06sspp2_4u:291_4: ye'pi te suddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā,
S06sspp2_4u:291_5: ye 'pi tadanye mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragā ihāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgṛhītuṃ paryavāptuṃ vandituṃ pūjayituṃ tebhya idaṃ dharmadānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu ta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya pūjayitvā vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramanti tasya punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ subhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā,
S06sspp2_4u:291_6: ye 'pi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā [ŚsP_II-4_87] yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devā paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:291_7: bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā,
S06sspp2_4u:291_8: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā ḍevā akaniṣṭhā devās te dharmavareṇa guptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:291_9: nāsya kauśikāvatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:291_10: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:291_11: ye 'pi devaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās te tatrāgantavyā maṃsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:291_12: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye.
S06sspp2_4u:291_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇārthāya sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhārthāya pratyupasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:292_0: śakra āha: katham bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:292_3: iha yāmā devā āgacchanti, iha tuṣitā devā āgacchanti, iha nirmāṇaratayo devā āgacchanti,
S06sspp2_4u:292_9: iha ābhā devā āgacchanti, iha parīttābhā devā āgacchanti,
S06sspp2_4u:292_12: iha śubhā devā āgacchanti, iha parīttaśubhā devā āgacchanti,
S06sspp2_4u:292_15: iha bṛhā devā āgacchanti, iha parīttabṛhā devā āgacchanti,
S06sspp2_4u:292_18: iha abṛhā devā āgacchanti, iha atapā devā āgacchanti, iha sudṛśā devā āgacchanti, iha sudarśanā devā āgacchanti,
S06sspp2_4u:292_20: samantād daśa dig lokadhātubhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ vandituṃ namaskartuṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
S06sspp2_4u:293_0: bhagavān āha: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udāram avabhāsaṃ saṃjñāsyate yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sthāpitā bhaviṣyati niṣṭhā [ŚsP_II-4_88] tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā gantavyā maheśākhyamāheśākhyā maharddhikā mahānubhāvā mahaujaskā iha devatā āgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ vandituṃ namaskartuṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
S06sspp2_4u:294_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamācāro bhavati tasya tayā caukṣasamācāratayā devatā āgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvodgṛhya paryavāpya satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:294_2: yāś ca tatra pradeśo alpaśākhyadevatā adhyuṣitā bhaviṣyanti tās tatropasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:294_3: tāsāṃ maheśākhyānāṃ devātānāṃ tejaś ca śriyaṃ ca gauravaṃ cāsahamānā,
S06sspp2_4u:294_4: yathā yathā maheśākhyamaheśākhyā maharddhikā mahānubhāvā devatā upasaṃkramitavyā maṃsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:294_5: tathā tathā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udārādhimuktiko bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:294_6: tasya ca sthānasya samantād acaukṣasamudācāratā na pracārayitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:294_7: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe gandhodakāvasiktaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ kartavyaḥ puṣpagandhāvakīrṇagandhaghaṭikānidhūpitaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:294_8: avasaktapaṭṭadāmācailavitānavitato netrapracāraṃ ca tat sa pṛthivīpradeśo 'laṃkartavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:295_0: na punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyaklamatho bhaviṣyati kāyasukhatāṃ ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:295_1: kāyalaghutāṃ ca kāyakathanīyataṃ ca cittasukhatāṃ ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate cittalaghutāṃ ca cittakam athanīyatāṃ ca tataḥ sa rātrau śayyāṃ kalpayantīmām eva prajñāpāramitām aśayeṇādhimuñcan na pāpakān svapnān drakṣati sa paśyaṃs tathāgatam evārhantan samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvagatam aśītyanuvyañjanaiḥ samalaṃkṛtasuvarṇavarṇena kāyena bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayataṃ tasya ca tathāgatasyāntikād dharmaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:295_2: yad uta dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām.
S06sspp2_4u:296_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ mahāśūnyatāṃ paramārthaśūnyatāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatām atyantaśūnyatām anavarāgraśūnyatām anavakāraśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām [ŚsP_II-4_89] anupalambhaśūnyatām abhāvaśūnyatāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām.
S06sspp2_4u:297_0: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āryasatyāni dhyānāni apramāṇāni ārūpyasamāpattayo aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_4u:297_1: abhijñā samādhīn dhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:298_0: tasyāś ca dānapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:298_1: tasyāś ca śīlapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śrosyati,
S06sspp2_4u:298_2: tasyāś ca vīryapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:298_3: tasyāś ca kṣāntipāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:298_4: tasyāś ca dhyānapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:298_5: tasyāś ca prajñāpāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:299_1: tasyāś ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:299_3: evaṃ hi śūnyatāśūnyatāyā mahāśūnyatāyāḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā atyantaśūnyatāyā anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anavakāraśūnyatāyāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anupalambhaśūnyatāyā abhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:300_0: teṣāṃ ca caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_1: teṣāṃ ca caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_2: teṣāṃ ca caturṇām ṛddhipādānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_3: teṣāñ ca pañcānām indriyānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_4: teṣāñ ca pañcānāṃ balānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_5: teṣāñ ca saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_8: teṣāñ ca caturṇāṃ dhyānānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroḥyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_9: teṣāñ ca caturṇām apramāṇānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_10: teṣāñ ca catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_11: teṣāñ cāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_12: teṣāñ ca navām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śrohyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_13: teṣāñ ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām arthaṃ [ŚsP_II-4_90] vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_15: teṣāñ ca samādhīnām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_16: teṣāñ ca dhāraṇīmukhānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_17: teṣāñ ca tathāgatabalānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_18: teṣāñ ca caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_19: teṣāñ ca catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_20: tasyāś ca mahākaruṇāyām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:300_21: tasyāñ cāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:301_0: bodhivṛkṣaṃ drakṣati bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlam upasaṃkrāmaṃ taṃ drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:301_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyamānaṃ drakṣyati tathābhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayaṃ taṃ drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:301_4: evañ ca sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:301_5: evaṃ māras sa pariṣadkāṃ nirjatavyā bahunāñ ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṇāṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:302_0: pūrvasyāṃ diśi śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:303_0: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhiḥ bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:304_0: paścimāyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06sspp2_4u:305_0: uttarasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:306_0: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ [ŚsP_II-4_91] śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:307_0: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:308_0: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:309_0: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:310_0: adhastād diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_4u:311_0: upariṣṭād diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06sspp2_4u:312_0: pūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:312_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:313_0: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:313_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:314_0: paścimāyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti [ŚsP_II-4_92] drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:314_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:315_0: uttarasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:315_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:316_0: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:316_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇiacīvaracchattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:317_0: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:317_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākabhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:318_0: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:318_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:319_0: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:319_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pujābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān [ŚsP_II-4_93] drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:320_0: adhastād diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:320_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhai mālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:321_0: upariṣṭād diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:321_1: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti tāṃś ca tathāgatastūpān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachattradhvajapatākābhiṛ bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:322_1: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān eva rūpān bhadrakā svapnān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:322_2: sa sukham eva śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sukhaṃ ca prativibhotsyate srotaprakṣiptaś cāsya kāyo bhhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:322_3: laghusaṃjñā ca kāye saṃjñāsyate na gurusaṃjñā na cāsya balavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati na cīvaragṛddhir bhaviṣyati na glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāragṛdhir bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:322_4: mṛddhī cāsyāhārasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhīcīvarasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhīglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ saṃjñā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:323_0: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādhavyutthitasya manasikārapariṣyandi tena cittena balavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati mṛdukā cāsyāhārasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:324_0: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na bakavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:324_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasyā mānuṣyāḥ kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:325_0: ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandhharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:326_0: ye ca dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:327_0: ye paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:328_1: ye ca uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:329_0: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:330_0: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:331_0: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:332_0: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:333_0: adhastād diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:334_0: upariṣṭād diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:335_0: imām api kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhītukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitāprayatvataḥ srotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:336_0: atha cet sa kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhīyān na dhārayen na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś cchattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:337_0: evaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahujanahitāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati bahujanasukhāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:337_1: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati na tve vayaḥ samatād [ŚsP_II-4_95] daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyakṣaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāśanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ parinirvṛtān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ saptaratnamayān stūpākāryat,
S06sspp2_4u:337_2: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiś patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:339_2: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayata:
S06sspp2_4u:339_3: sacet tvaṃ kauśikemaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ pūrṇaṃ cūḍikāvabaddhaṃ tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ labhethā yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta,
S06sspp2_4u:340_0: śakra āha: sacen me bhagavann ayaṃ jāmbūdvīpaḥ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīpeta yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta imām evāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyām.
S06sspp2_4u:340_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na me bhagavan tatra tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpratyayaṃ nābahumānatā nāpy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarīrāṇi,
S06sspp2_4u:340_2: na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo na pūjayitukāmaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:340_3: api tu khalu punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā niryātāni tāni śarīrāṇi tena tena tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjayante prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni śarīrāṇi tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjā labhante,
S06sspp2_4u:340_4: yadāhaṃ bhagavan tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyais tat prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitānīti kṛtvā yac ca tathāgataśarīrāṇi sadevamānuṣāsurena lokena satkrīyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante tat prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitānīti kṛtvā.
S06sspp2_4u:341_0: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:341_1: iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā agrāhyā arūpiṇī anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā.
S06sspp2_4u:341_2: tat kathaṃ tvam agrāhyā prajñāpāramitām arūpiṇīm anidarśanām apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā grahītavyāṃ maṃyase.
S06sspp2_4u:341_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya notsargāya pratyupasthitā na hānaye na vṛddhaye nācayāya notkṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ chorayitrī na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ dātri na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śrāvakadharmaṇāṃ dātrī na śaikṣāśaikṣādharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ chorayitrī nāsaṃskṛtadhātor dātrī na saṃskṛtadhātoś chorayitrī na dānapāramitāyā dātrī na śīlapāramitāyā dātrī na kṣāntipāramitāyā dātrī na vīryapāramitāyā dātrī na dhyānapāramitāyā dātri na prajñāpāramitāyā dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:342_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyā dātrī, na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā dātrī, nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā [ŚsP_II-4_97] dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:342_1: na śūnyatāśūnyatāyā dātrī, na mahāśūnyatāyā dātrī, na paramārthaśūnyatāyā dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:342_2: na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nātyantaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nānavarāgraśūnyatāyā dātrī, nānavakāraśūnyatāyā dātrī, na prakṛtiśūnyatāyā dātrī, na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:342_4: nānupalambhaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nābhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī, na svabhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:343_0: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ dātrī, na samyakprahāṇānāṃ dātrī, na ṛddhipādānāṃ dātrī, nendriyāṇāṃ dātrī, na balānāṃ dātrī, na bodhyaṅgānāṃ dātrī, nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:343_1: nāryasatyānāṃ dātrī, na dhyānānāṃ dātrī, nāpramāṇānāṃ dātrī, nārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ dātrī, na vimokṣāṇāṃ dātrī, nānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:343_3: nābhijñānāṃ dātrī, na samādhīnāṃ dātrī, na dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ dātrī, na tathāgatabalānāṃ dātrī, na vaiśāradyānāṃ dātrī, na pratisaṃvidāṃ dātrī, na mahākaruṇāyā dātrī, nāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:344_0: śakra āha: evam etad bhadanta śāradvatīputraivam etad yo bhadanta śāradvatīputraivaṃ jānāti,
S06sspp2_4u:344_1: na prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātri na pṛthagjanadharmaṇāṃ chorayitrī na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śaikṣāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃś chorayitrī nāsaṃskṛtadhātor dātri na saṃskṛtadhātor chorayitrī.
S06sspp2_4u:345_0: na dānapāramitāyā dātrī na śīlapāramitāyā dātrī na kṣāntipāramitāyā dātrī na vīryapāramitāyā dātrī na dhyānapāramitāyā dātrī na prajñāpāramitāyā dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:346_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyā dātrī, na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā dātrī, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:346_1: na śūnyatāśūnyatāyā dātrī, na mahāśūnyatāyā dātrī. na paramārthaśūnyatāyā dātri,
S06sspp2_4u:346_2: na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā dātri, nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nātyantaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nānavarāgraśūnyatāyā dātrī, nānavakāraśūnyatāyā, dātrī, na prakṛtiśūnyatāyā dātrī, na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:346_4: nānupalambhaśūnyatāyā dātrī, nābhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī, na svabhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī, [ŚsP_II-4_98] nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:347_0: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ dātri, samyakprahāṇānāṃ dātrī, na ṛddhipādānāṃ dātrī, nendriyāṇāṃ dātrī, na balānāṃ dātrī, na bodhyaṅgānāṃ dātrī, nāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya dātri,
S06sspp2_4u:347_1: nāryasatyānāṃ dātrī, na dhyānānāṃ dātrī, nāpramāṇānāṃ dātrī, nārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ dātrī, na vimokṣāṇāṃ dātrī, nānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:347_3: nābhijñānāṃ dātrī, na samādhīnāṃ dātri, na dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ dātrī, na tathāgatabalānāṃ dātrī, na vaiśāradyānāṃ dātrī, na pratisaṃvidāṃ dātri, na mahākaruṇāyā dātri, nāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:347_5: na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya dātri, nānāgāmiphalasya dātrī, nārhattvasya dātrī, na pratyekabodher dātri, na mārgākārajñatāyā dātrī, na sarvākārajñatāyā dātrī. sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīḥ sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati.
S06sspp2_4u:348_1: advayā hi prajñāpāramitā, na dhyānapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:348_2: advayā hi dhhyānapāramitā, na vīryapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:348_3: advayā hi vīryapāramitā, na kṣāntipāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:348_4: advayā hi kṣāntipāramitā, na śīlapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:348_5: advayā hi śīlapāramitā, na dānapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:349_0: atha bhagavāñ chakro devānām indrāya sādhukāram adāt: sādhu sādhu kauśikaivam etad yathā nirdiśasi,
S06sspp2_4u:350_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:350_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:350_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:350_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:350_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:350_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:350_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:350_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi dānapāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:351_0: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:351_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:351_2: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched [ŚsP_II-4_99] yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:351_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:351_4: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:351_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:351_6: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:351_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:351_8: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:351_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:351_10: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:351_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:352_0: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:352_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:352_2: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:352_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:352_4: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:352_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:352_6: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:352_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:352_8: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:352_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:352_10: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:352_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:353_0: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:353_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:353_2: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:353_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:353_4: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:353_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:353_6: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā [ŚsP_II-4_100] dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:353_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:353_8: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:353_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:353_10: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:353_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:354_0: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:354_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06sspp2_4u:354_2: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:354_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:354_4: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:354_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikācintyadhhātuś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:354_6: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:354_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:354_8: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:354_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca śīlapāramita cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:354_10: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06sspp2_4u:354_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:355_1: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:355_2: namaskaraṇīyeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokeṇa yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:355_3: abhisaṃbhotsyante ca, yadāhaṃ bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ tasminn evendrāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi yan me svakam āsanaṃ tatra devaputrā mamopasthānāyāgacchanti,
S06sspp2_4u:355_4: te māṃ pūjayanti yadā tatra na gacchāmi tatrāsanena niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi tadā te devaputrās tāṃ sabhām āgatya tad āsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar eva prakrāmati.
S06sspp2_4u:355_5: iha śakro devānām indro niṣadya devebhyas trayastriṃśebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06sspp2_4u:355_6: evam etad bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dhārayiṣyate svādhyāyiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:355_8: tatra ye te daśadiglokadhātuṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās [ŚsP_II-4_101] te tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vanditvā namaskṛtya prakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:355_9: ito niryātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ito niryātāś ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā ito niryātaṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yad api tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjā labhante tad api prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitatvāt pūjāṃ pratilabhante.
S06sspp2_4u:355_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ carataḥ sarvajñajñānasyāśrayabhūtā pratyayabhūtā kāraṇabhūtā āhārikā tasmāt tarhi bhagavann anayor dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām evāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yadāhaṃ bhagavann imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyāmy udgṛhya svādhyāyaṃ karomi dharmāntargatena mānasena nimittaṃ apy ahaṃ bhagavan tasmin samaye na samanupaśyāmi bhayasya vā stambhitatvasya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:356_0: animittā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:356_1: animittā hi bhagavan dhyānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:356_2: animittā hi bhagavan vīryapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:356_3: animittā hi bhagavan kṣāntipāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:356_4: animittā hi bhagavan śīlapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:356_5: animittā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:357_0: animittā hi bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_1: animittā hi bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_2: animittā hi bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_3: animittā hi bhagavañ chūnyatāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavañ chūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_4: animittā hi bhagavan mahāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_5: animittā hi bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_6: animittā hi bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatā aliṅga anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūṅyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_7: animittā hi bhagavann asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhāra hi bhagavann asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_8: animittā hi bhagavann atyantaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann atyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_9: animittā hi bhagavann anavarāgraśūnyatā aliṅgā [ŚsP_II-4_102] anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_10: animittā hi bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_11: animittā hi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_12: animittā hi bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_13: animittā hi bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_14: animittā hi bhagavann anupalambhaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_15: animittā hi bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_16: animitta hi bhagavan svabhāvasūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:357_17: animitta hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_4u:358_0: animittāni hi bhagavan smṛtyupasthānāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_1: animittāni hi bhagavan samyakprahāṇāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyahārāṇi hi bhagavan samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_2: animittā hi bhagavann ṛddhipadā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann ṛddhipādaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_3: animittāni hi bhagavann indriyāṇy aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāraṇi hi bhagavann indriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_4u:358_4: animittāni hi bhagavan balāny aliṅgāny anabhilapyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavann indriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_4u:358_5: animittāni hi bhagavan bodhyaṅgāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāraṇi hi bhagavan bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_6: animittaḥ hi bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'liṅgo 'nabhilāpyo 'pravyāhāro hi bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_7: animittāni hi bhagavann āryasatyāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavann āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_8: animittāni hi bhagavan dhyānāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyahārāṇi hi bhagavann dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_9: animittāni hi bhagavann apramāṇāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāṛāṇi hi bhagavann apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_10: animittā hi bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_11: animittā hi bhagavan vimokṣā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_12: animittā hi bhagavann anupūrvaviharasamāpattayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anupūrvaviharasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_13: animittāni hi bhagavañ chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamukhāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavañ chūnyatanimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_14: animittā hi [ŚsP_II-4_103] bhagavann abhijñā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_15: animittā hi bhagavan samādhayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_16: animittāni hi bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhany aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_17: animittāni hi bhagavaṃs tathāgatabalāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavaṃs tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_18: animittāni hi bhagavan vaiśāradyāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_4u:358_19: animittā hi bhagavan pratisaṃvido 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_20: animittā hi bhagavan mahākaruṇāliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_4u:358_21: animittā hi bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:358_22: animittā hi bhagavan sarvajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_4u:358_23: animittā hi bhagavan mārgākārajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_4u:358_24: animittā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_4u:359_1: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nimittam abhaviṣyan nānimittaṃ naiva tasya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmān nimittān aliṅgān abhilāpyān apravyāhārān viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilāpyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:359_2: yasmāt tarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā animittā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā tamāt tathāgataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:359_3: sarvadharmān aliṅgān anabhilāpyān apravyāhārān viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilāpyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:359_4: tasmāt tarhi bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sadevamanuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:359_5: likhitvā ca satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:360_0: yo hi kaścid bhagavann imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:360_1: tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:360_2: puṣpair mālyair gandhair [ŚsP_II-4_104] vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:361_0: tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:361_3: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati tathāgatadarśanena sattvaparipācakena ca buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:361_4: tāṃś ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayet pūjayet,
S06sspp2_4u:361_5: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaih.
S06sspp2_4u:362_0: punar bhagavan saced ayaṃ trisāhasro lokadhātuś cūḍikāvabaddhaḥ syāt tathāgataśarīraiḥ pūrṇo yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvopanāmyate.
S06sspp2_4u:362_1: anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyām.
S06sspp2_4u:362_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato niryātā hi bhagavans tathāgatās tāni ca tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante yāni kulaputrāś ca kuladuhitaraś ca satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ gacchanti.
S06sspp2_4u:362_3: divyamānuṣīḥ saṃpattīr anubhūya yathā praṇidhānaṃ parinirvāti.
S06sspp2_4u:362_4: yadi vā śrāvakayānena yadi vā pratyekabuddhayānena yadi vā samyaksaṃbuddhayānena,
S06sspp2_4u:362_5: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yac ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ yac ca prajñāpāramitāyā darśanaṃ tulyam etat.
S06sspp2_4u:362_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:363_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas triṣu prātihāryeṣu sthitvā dharmadeśayet sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānanidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāt,
S06sspp2_4u:363_1: yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai deśayet tulyam etat.
S06sspp2_4u:363_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? ito niryātā hi bhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti niryātāni trīṇi prātihāryāṇi.
S06sspp2_4u:364_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopamāṃ tathāgatān arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:364_11: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānanidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśān yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai deśayet tulyam etat.
S06sspp2_4u:364_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? ito niryātā hi te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ito niryātā tāni triṇi prātihāryāṇi ito niryātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānaṃ nidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāḥ.
