S06sspp2_4u:365_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca te daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkriyeran gurukriyeran mānayeran pūjayeran puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:365_1: yaś ca prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvā satkriyeta gurukriyeta mānyeta pūjyeta puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tulyam etat.
S06sspp2_4u:365_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? ito niryātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:366_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā.
S06sspp2_4u:366_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sthito 'vaivartyabhūmau veditavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:366_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tāṃ ca likhitvā satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tathā hi bhagavan sarvabhayapraśamani sarvaroganirghātanīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:367_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tasya na kutaścid bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:367_1: tad yathāpi nāma [ŚsP_II-4_106] bhagavan dhanikabhayabhītaḥ puruṣo rājānaṃ seveta rājānam upatiṣṭheta sa rājānaṃ sevamāno rājānam upatiṣṭhamāno yata evāsya bhayaṃ bhavati ta evaivaṃ sevante na ca sa tebhyo bibheti.
S06sspp2_4u:367_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? evam etad bhagavan bhavati yo rājaniḥśrito bhavati balavatiniśrito bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:368_0: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhate.
S06sspp2_4u:368_1: yad api bhagavan sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitaṃ draṣṭavyam,
S06sspp2_4u:368_2: tasmād ahaṃ bhagavann anayor dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyāt.
S06sspp2_4u:368_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? ito niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgataśarīrāṇy ato niryātāni dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny ato niryātāni tathāgatasya daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:368_4: ato niryātā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā ato niryātā bhagavan pañcapāramitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_4u:368_5: yāvad ato niryātā tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatā yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu yatra ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyate vācayiṣyate paryavāpsyate tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyate pūjayiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:368_6: tena tatra manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:368_7: sarve ca te anupūrveṇa parinirvānadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:368_8: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ manyat amānyat anena yānena.
S06sspp2_4u:368_10: atra hi nāma bhagavaṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānāṃ buddhasatyena pratyupasthitā buddhotpādo bhagavaṃs tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:368_12: tad yathāpi nāma bhagavann anargho 'yaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:368_13: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnam ebhir evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:369_2: yatrāmanuṣyagṛhītā stri vā puruṣo vā bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:369_4: tataḥ so 'manuṣyas tasya mahāmaṇiratnasya tejo sahamānaḥ kṣipram evāprakrāman nāvatiṣṭheta pittena vā dahyamānasya tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ śarīre sthāpyeta tad api pittam atigṛhṇīyāt pātābhibhūte vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyet tad api vā taṃ atigṛhṇīyāt.
S06sspp2_4u:370_0: śleṣmaṇāropastabdhe śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api śleṣmāṇam upaśāmayet sāṃnipātiko vā vyādhir bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:370_1: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ śarīre sthāpyeta tad api sāṃnipātikaṃ vyādhim upaśamen nāsau [ŚsP_II-4_107] vivardheta tad rātrau cāvabhāsaṃ kuryād uṣmakāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tat taṃ pradeśaṃ śītalaṃ kuryāt śītakāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpya na tat pradeśam uṣmaṃ kuryāt,
S06sspp2_4u:370_2: yatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ s sthāpyeta tat pṛthvīpradeśe nātyuṣmaṃ nātiśītamṛdusaṃpannaṃ kuryāt yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe āśiviṣapradeśe upacaret.
S06sspp2_4u:371_0: tad anye 'pi ca vṛścikādayaḥ sarīsṛpāḥ prāṇino na tatropacaret.
S06sspp2_4u:371_1: yā kācid bhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭho bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:371_2: tasya tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ darśet tasya sahadarśanena tad viṣaṃ vigacchet.
S06sspp2_4u:372_0: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:372_1: yāsām api bhagavan strīṇāṃ vā puruṣāṇāṃ vā arbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā ajakaṃ vā akṣirogo vā srotarogo vā ghrāṇarogo vā jihvārogo vā kaṇṭharogo vā kāyarogo vā bhavet teṣāṃ tan māhamaṇiratnaṃ kāye sthāpyet,
S06sspp2_4u:372_2: teṣāṃ tad arbudaṃ vā vā timiraṃ vā ajakaṃ vā akṣirogo vā srotrarogo vā ghrāṇarogo vā jihvārogo vā kaṇṭharogo vā kāyarogo vā upaśāmyet.
S06sspp2_4u:373_0: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:373_1: yatrāpi bhagavann udake tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣipet,
S06sspp2_4u:373_2: tad eva tad udakam aṣṭāṅgopetam ekavarṇaṃ bhavet.
S06sspp2_4u:374_0: sacet bhagavan nīlakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_1: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_2: sacet pītakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_3: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_4: sacet lohitakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_5: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_6: saced avadānakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_7: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_8: sacet māñjiṣṭhāvarṇena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_9: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_10: sacet sphaṭikavarṇena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_11: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_12: ebhiś ca nānāprakāraiś cīvarais tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyeta tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_13: yad api bhagavaṃs tatrodake kāluṣyante tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ prasādayet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_14: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ [ŚsP_II-4_108] tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:374_15: anyaiś ca evam eva bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā divyamaṇiratnaprakhyā sarvaguṇākarabhūtā sarvapāpamocanī.
S06sspp2_4u:375_1: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:375_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika divyam etan maṇiratnam utāho svij jāṃbudvīpakanāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnam asti.
S06sspp2_4u:376_0: śakra āha: divyam etad bhadanta maṇiratnam.
S06sspp2_4u:377_0: api tu khalu punar bhadantānanda yāni jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ mahāmaṇiratnāny asti tāni parīttāni gurūṇi ca,
S06sspp2_4u:377_1: yāni divyāni tāni mahānti laghūni ca tair aṅgais tāvat suparipūrṇāni jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni yathā divyāni tāni punar jāṃbūdvīpakāni ratnāni teṣāṃ divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ saṃkhyāṃ vā kalāṃ vā gaṇanāṃ vā upamāṃ vā upaniśāṃ vā nopayānti.
S06sspp2_4u:378_0: punar api śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:378_1: tat khalu punar bhagavan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yasmin karaṇḍake prakṣiptaṃ bhavet yadā kṣiptaṃ bhavet yadā kṣipataṃ ca tataḥ karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīyam eva tat karaṇḍakaṃ bhavet tair maṇiratnaguṇaiḥ paro 'pi tatra karaṇḍake spṛhom utpādayet,
S06sspp2_4u:378_2: evam eva bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:378_3: tatra teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā kāyikāś cetasikā vā duḥkhopadravā manuṣyakṛtā vā amanuṣyakṛtā vā na bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:378_4: mahāmaṇiratnam iti bhagavan prajñāpāramitām etad adhivacanaṃ sarvākārajñatājñānasyaitad adhivacanam.
S06sspp2_4u:379_0: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhajanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:379_1: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhyānapāramitāyā guṇā dhyānapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:379_2: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ vīryapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vīryapāramitāyā guṇā vīryapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:379_3: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi kṣāntipāramitāyā guṇāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhajanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:379_4: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śīlapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi śīlapāramitāyā [ŚsP_II-4_109] guṇāḥ śīlapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhajanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:379_5: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dānapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dānapāramitāyā guṇā dānapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
S06sspp2_4u:380_0: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam adhyātmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy adhyātmaśūnyatāyā guṇā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_1: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayituṃ aprameyā hi bahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_2: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_3: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi śūnyatāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_4: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mahāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mahāśūnyatāyā guṇā mahāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_5: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi paramārthaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_6: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_7: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_8: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam atyantaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy atyantaśūnyatāyā guṇā atyantaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_9: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam anavarāgraśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anavarāgraśūnyatāyā guṇā anavarāgraśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_10: kiyanto bhagavañchakyam anavakāraśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anavakāraśūnyatāyā guṇā anavakāraśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_11: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_12: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_13: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ [ŚsP_II-4_110] svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_14: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam anupalambhaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anupalambhaśūnyatāyā guṇā anupalambhaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_15: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy abhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇā abhāvaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_16: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi svabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:380_17: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
S06sspp2_4u:381_0: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi smṛtyupasthānānāṃ guṇāḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:381_1: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi samyakprahāṇānāṃ guṇā samyakprahāṇānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_2: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ṛddhipādānāṃ guṇā ṛddhipādānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_3: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ pañcānām indriyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy indriyānāṃ guṇā indriyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:381_4: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ pañcānaṃ balānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi balānāṃ guṇā balānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_5: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi bodhyaṅgānāṃ guṇā bodhyaṅgānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_6: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy āryāṣtāṅgasya mārgasya guṇā āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_7: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇam āryasatyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy āryasatyānāṃ guṇā aryasatyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīraṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_8: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhyānānāṃ guṇā dhyānānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_9: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy apramāṇānāṃ guṇā apramāṇānāṃ ca tāni [ŚsP_II-4_111] tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_10: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ guṇā ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_11: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vimokṣāṇāṃ guṇā vimokṣāṇāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_12: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ guṇā anupūrvavihārasamāpattināṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_13: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameya hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ guṇāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_14: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhijñānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyāhy abhijñānāṃ guṇā abhijñānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_15: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ samādhīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi samādhīnāṃ guṇāḥ samādhīnāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_16: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ guṇā dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_17: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi tathāgatabalānāṃ guṇāḥ tathāgatabalānāṃ ca i tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_18: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vaiśāradyānāṃ guṇā vaiśāradyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_19: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi pratisaṃvidāṃ guṇāḥ pratisaṃvidaṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_20: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mahāmaitryā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mahāmaitryā guṇāḥ mahāmaitryāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_21: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mahākaruṇāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mahākaruṇāyā guṇā mahākaruṇāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bbājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_22: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ guṇā āveṇikabuddhadharmāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_23: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvajñatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvajñatāyā guṇā sarvajñatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_24: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mārgākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mārgākārajñatāyā [ŚsP_II-4_112] guṇā mārgākārajñatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_25: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_26: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ tathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi tathatāyā guṇās tathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_27: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam avitathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy avitathatāyā guṇā avitathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_28: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam ananyatathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ananyatathatāyā guṇā ananyatathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:381_29: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmatāyā guṇā dharmatāyaś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:381_30: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmadhātor guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmadhātor guṇā dharmadhātoś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:381_31: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmasthititāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmasthititāyā guṇā dharmasthititāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_32: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmaniyāmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmaniyāmatāyā guṇāḥ dharmaniyāmatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_33: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ bhūtakoṭer guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi bhūtakoṭer guṇā bhūtakoṭeś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:381_34: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam acintyadhātor guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy acintyadhātor guṇā acintyadhātoś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:381_35: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasya guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasya guṇāḥ sarvavasanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasya ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_36: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sadopekṣāvihāritāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sadopekṣāvihāritāyā guṇāḥ sadopekṣāvihāritayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:381_37: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam asaṃpramosadharmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy asaṃpramoṣadharmatāyā guṇā asaṃpramoṣadharmatāyaś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
S06sspp2_4u:382_14: tayā ca dharmatāpāramitayā paribhāvitāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena parinirvṛtasyāpi tasya tathāgatasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06sspp2_4u:383_1: punar aparaṃ bhagavan tiṣṭhantu trisāhasramahāsāḥsro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:383_2: sacet bhagavan daśasu dikṣuḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhā bhaveyur yac ca prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyetaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:383_3: anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhīyām.
S06sspp2_4u:383_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjyaṃte prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitani bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06sspp2_4u:384_0: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu yāmeṣu deveṣu tuṣiteṣu deveṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu sukham anubhūya tenaiva kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:384_1: etāvat tathāgataśarīrapūjāyāḥ phalam imāṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan samādhipāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:386_19: mahāmaitrīṃ paripūrayiṣyati, mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayiṣyati, aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:387_0: śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:387_5: yadi vā cakravartāśrayaṃ yadi vā kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā śakrarūpeṇa yadi vā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yadi vā vaiśramaṇarūpeṇa sa tair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:387_6: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan na mama tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpy apratyayā nāpy apūjayitukāmatā nāpy agrahītukāmatā.
S06sspp2_4u:388_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvatā gurukurvatā mānayatā pūjayata sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ hetur upacito bhavati sarvasaṃpattayaś ca parigṛhītā bhavanti,
S06sspp2_4u:388_1: tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkṛtā bhavanti gurukṛtāni bhavanti yāni tāni bhavanti pūjitāni bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:389_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā [ŚsP_II-4_115] aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyate yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti tān dhharmakāyena ca jñānakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena pūjayitukāmena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:389_1: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsakhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ drakṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:389_2: evaṃ khalu tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca tāṃ buddhān anusmṛtibhāvayitavyā dharmatayā.
S06sspp2_4u:390_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saṃdraṣṭukāmena,
S06sspp2_4u:390_1: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:391_0: katame dve saṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā?
S06sspp2_4u:392_0: tatra bhagavan katamā saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmatā? yad adhyātmaśūnyatāyaṃ jñānaṃ yad bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāṃ jñānaṃ yad śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad mahāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad sarvadharmaśūnyatayāṃ jñānaṃ yad svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānam.
S06sspp2_4u:393_4: yat pañcasu baleṣu jñānaṃ, yat saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu jñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:393_5: yad āryāṣṭāṅge marge jñānaṃ, yac caturṣv āryasatyeṣu jñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:393_6: yac caturṣu dhyāneṣu jñānaṃ, yac caturṣv apramāṇeṣu jñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:393_8: yad aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu jñānaṃ, yan navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu jñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:393_11: yat sarvasamādhiṣu jñānaṃ, yat sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu jñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:393_15: yan mahāmaitryāṃ jñānaṃ, yan mahākaruṇāyāṃ jñānaṃ, yad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu jñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:394_0: tatra katamā asaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā? yasyā notpādo na nirodho na sthānaṃ na sthito nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhir yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvatā,
S06sspp2_4u:395_0: katamā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvatā? abhāvasvabhāvā hi sarvadharmā iyam ucyate,
S06sspp2_4u:396_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:396_1: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:396_2: ye 'pi te etarhi daśadig lokadhātuṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:396_3: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06sspp2_4u:396_4: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atītānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:396_5: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgatānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:396_6: ye 'py etarhi pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:396_7: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:396_13: ye 'pi te etarhi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti tair apīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya pratyekabodhiḥ prāptāḥ prāpsyate prāpyate ca.
S06sspp2_4u:396_14: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyā sarvāṇi trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni,
S06sspp2_4u:396_15: tāni punar animittayogenānupalambhayogenānutpādayogenānirodhayogenāsasaṃkleśayogenāvyavadānayogenānabhisaṃskārayogenānāyūhayogenāniryuhayogenānukṣepayogenāprakṣepayogenānugrahayogenānutsargayogena [ŚsP_II-4_117] tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthena.
S06sspp2_4u:396_16: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitā āramitā na pāramitā na hi prajñāpāramitā apāro na pāraḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:396_17: na sthalaṃ na nimnaṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na laukikī na lokottarā na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā na kuśalā nākuśalā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06sspp2_4u:396_18: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmānāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:396_19: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā srotaāpattidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:396_20: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:396_21: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā anāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:396_22: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā arhaddharmāṇāṃ dātrī na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:396_23: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:397_1: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:397_2: atra bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajānanti na sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate nātmanam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakam upalabhate na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:401_0: na cakṣurvijñānam upalabhate, na śrotravijñānam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:406_0: na dānapāramitām upalabhate, na śīlapāramitām upalabhate, na kṣāntipāramitām upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:407_3: na mahāśūnyatām upalabhate, na paramārthaśūnyatām upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:408_2: na rddhipādān upalabhante, nendriyāny upalabhante, na balāny upalabhante, na bodhyaṅgāny upalabhante, nāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgam upalabhante,
S06sspp2_4u:408_3: nāryasatyāny upalabhante, na dhyānāny upalabhante, nāpramāṇāny upalabhante, nārūpyasamāpattīr upalabhante,
S06sspp2_4u:408_4: nāṣṭau vimokṣām upalabhante, na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr upalabhante,
S06sspp2_4u:408_6: nābhijñā upalabhante, na samādhīn upalabhante, na dhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhante,
S06sspp2_4u:408_8: na vaiśāradyāny upalabhante, na pratisaṃvida upalabhante, na mahāmaitrīm upalabhante, na mahākaruṇām upalabhante, nāveṇikabuddhadharmān upalabhante,
S06sspp2_4u:408_11: nānāgāmiphalam upalabhante, nārhattvam upalabhante, na pratyekabodhim upalabhante,
S06sspp2_4u:408_14: na bodhisattvam upalabhante, na buddham upalabhante, na buddhadharmān upalabhante.
S06sspp2_4u:409_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yenopalabhet yad vopapalabhet yatra vopalabhet.
S06sspp2_4u:410_1: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, yathā hi tad dīrgharātrau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sa bodhim api nopalabhhate prāg eva buddhaṃ prāg eva buddhadharmān.
S06sspp2_4u:411_0: śakra āha: punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na tadanyāsu pāramitāsu.
S06sspp2_4u:412_0: bhagavān āha: sarvāsu kauśika ṣaḍpāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:412_1: sa dānam api nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:412_2: śīlam api nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:412_3: kṣāntim api nopalabhate kṣamīnam api nopalabhate vyāpādam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:412_4: vīryam api nopalabhate vīryavantam api nopalabhate kauśīdyam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:412_5: dhyānam api nopalabhate dhyāyinam api nopalabhate vikṣepam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:412_6: prajñām api nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate dauṣprajñam api nopalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:413_0: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:413_1: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:413_2: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntyā saṃpādāya kṣāntipāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:413_3: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryam ālambhamānasya vīryapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:413_4: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:413_5: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmān viviktataḥ prajñāpāramitāparipūraye sarvadharmānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:421_2: sparśasyānupalambhayogena, vedanāyā anupalambhayogena, tṛṣṇāyā anupalambhayogena, upādānasyānupalambhayogena, bhavasyānupalambhayogena, jāter anupalambhayogena, jarāmaraṇasyānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:425_0: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nānāpatrāṇāṃ nānāpuṣpāṇāṃ nānāphalānāṃ nānāsaṃkhyānāṃ nānārohapariṇāhānāṃ teṣāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:425_1: anyatra cchāyā cchāyety evaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti.
S06sspp2_4u:425_2: evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_122] pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītānāṃ sarvajñajñānapariṇāmitānāṃ ca viśeṣo nānākraṇaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:426_1: sarvaguṇaparipūrikā, aprameyaguṇasamanvāgatā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā apramāṇaguṇasamanvāgatā aparyantaguṇasamanvagatā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aparyavasānaguṇasamanvāgatayā tayā hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayet tāś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair uttare ca yathopadiṣṭāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād yo 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt kataras tayor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
S06sspp2_4u:427_0: bhagavān āha: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra paripakṣyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:427_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vadyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:427_3: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06sspp2_4u:427_4: tat sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ gṛhītvā satkuyād gurukruyāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:428_0: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavatā bhāṣitasvārtham ājānāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:428_1: yo yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:428_2: yo 'pi parasmai sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ dadyād ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:428_4: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vajropamaṃ samādhiḥ samāpadyaḥ vajropamam ātmabhāvaṃ bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayya sattvakāye tathāgatadhātuvainayikānāṃ sattvānām.
S06sspp2_4u:428_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? ye hi kecid bhagavan tathagatasyāntasaḥ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātuṃ pūjayiṣyanti vividhābhiḥ pūjābhiḥ sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam [ŚsP_II-4_123] adhigamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:429_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukruyād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parasmai likhitvā dadyād dharmaprītyā ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:430_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭā parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīt deśayet saṃprakāśayet vicaret vibhajet uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāñ cāntikād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:430_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣa evātra kauśika śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstānyā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitaiva śāstā śāstaiḥ prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:430_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_4u:430_5: ye 'pi te vijñāḥ sabrahmacāriṇas te 'pi nānye anyatrāvaivartikabodhisattvebhyo yatra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
S06sspp2_4u:430_6: atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakayānikā api śikṣitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:430_10: pratyekabuddhayānikā api śikṣitvā pratyekabodhin abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃvuddhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_4u:430_11: bodhisattvā api mahāsattvāḥ śikṣitvā bodhisattvaniyamam avakrāntā avakrāmanti avakrāmiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:430_12: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhānte abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:431_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tathāgatān arhataḥ sayakṣaṃbuddhānāṃ mukhaṃ satkartukāmair gurukartukāmair mānayitukāmaiḥ pūjayitukāmaiḥ puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair [ŚsP_II-4_124] mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair imaṃ cārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaitad abhūt,
S06sspp2_4u:431_1: katamad ahaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ so 'haṃ kauśika sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyām ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ cādhikaṃ vā na samanupaśyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:431_2: tasya mamaitad abhūd, ya nv eva mayā dharmābhisaṃbuddhaḥ śāntaḥ praṇītas tam eva dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ katamaś cāsau kauśika dharmā yad uta saiva prajñāpāramitā aham eva tāvat kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaromi gurukaromi mānayāmi pūjayāmi satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya viharāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:431_3: kim aṅga punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na satkartavyā na gurukartavyā na mānayitavyā na pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:431_4: śrāvakayānikair vā kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā pratyekabudhayānikair api kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:431_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniryātāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tathāgataniryātāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā śrāvakayānikaiś ca pratyekabuddhayanikaiś ca kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:431_6: yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca śrāvakayānikāś cārhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca pratyekabuddhayānīkāś ca pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca.
S06sspp2_4u:433_2: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayeta:
S06sspp2_4u:433_3: sacet kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:433_4: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānāṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:434_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:435_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vā vācanāya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:435_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti ca avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:435_2: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:435_3: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:435_4: anagāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:435_5: arhattvaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:435_6: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:435_7: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti cāvakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:436_0: katame ca te kauśika sāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ? yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni.
S06sspp2_4u:438_0: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:439_0: ime te kauśika anāsravā dharmā ye prajñāpāramitayā nirdiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāś cābhisaṃbudhyante cābhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06sspp2_4u:439_1: evaṃ kauśikaikaṃ sattvaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā [ŚsP_II-4_126] bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:439_2: na tv eva jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya.
S06sspp2_4u:439_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ sattvā aparimuktā evaṃ narakatiryagyoner yamalokān srotaāpattiphale kauśika sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ parimukto narakatiryagyoner yamalokān,
S06sspp2_4u:439_4: kaḥ punar vādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06sspp2_4u:439_5: yaś ca punaḥ kauśika sarvajāmbūdvīpakān sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06sspp2_4u:439_6: yaś caikaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:439_7: yo vā kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvajāmbūdvīpakān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed yaś ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekam api sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:439_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? buddhanetryāḥ so vyavacchedāya pratipanno bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:439_9: ya ekasattvam apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06sspp2_4u:439_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvaniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tad anena kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam.
S06sspp2_4u:439_11: bodhisattvo 'pi pūjayitavyo mānayitavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyaḥ puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:439_12: sa devakena lokena samārakena saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:439_13: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:439_14: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:441_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:441_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitva samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:441_8: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti [ŚsP_II-4_127] prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:441_9: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:442_0: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:444_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry aryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhani ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhani daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:444_1: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:444_2: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:444_3: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:444_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:445_2: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:445_8: ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:445_10: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:445_13: bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:445_16: abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā [ŚsP_II-4_128] devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:445_17: sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:447_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā prajñāyate, bahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:447_1: śūnyatāśūnyatā prajñāyate, mahāśūnyatā prajñāyate, paramārthaśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:447_2: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, atyantaśūnyatā prajñāyate, anavarāgraśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:447_3: anavakāraśūnyatā prajñāyate, prakṛtiśūnyatā prajñāyate, sarvadharmaśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:447_6: abhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate, svabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_4u:448_0: smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante, samyakprahāṇāni prajñāyante, ṛddhipādāḥ prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:448_1: āryasatyāni prajñāyante, dhyānāni prajñāyante, apramāṇāni prajñāyante, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:448_4: abhijñāḥ prajñāyante, samādhayaḥ prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante, tathāgatabalāni prajñāyante, vaiśāradyāni prajñāyante, pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:448_6: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, anāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ prajñāyate, pratyekabodhiṃ prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā prajñāyate, sarvākārajñatā prajñāyate, srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante, sakṛdāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:449_1: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā [ŚsP_II-4_129] vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:449_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:451_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:451_2: paṭhanāya vā Iekhanāya vā vācanāya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:451_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caśikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrānto avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:451_8: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:451_9: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:451_10: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
S06sspp2_4u:452_0: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:454_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:454_1: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:454_2: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:454_3: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:454_4: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:454_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_130] vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:455_2: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:455_8: ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:455_10: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:455_13: bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:455_16: abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:457_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā prajñāyate, bahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:457_1: śūnyatāśūnyatā prajñāyate, mahāśūnyatā prajñāyate, paramārthaśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:457_2: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, atyantaśūnyatā prajñāyate, anavarāgraśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:457_3: anavakāraśūnyatā prajñāyate, prakṛtiśūnyatā prajñāyate, sarvadharmaśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:457_6: abhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate, svabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_4u:458_0: smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante, samyakprahāṇāni prajñāyante, ṛddhipādāḥ prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:458_1: āryasatyāni prajñāyante, dhyānāni prajñāyante, apramāṇāni prajñāyante, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:458_5: samādhayaḥ prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante, tathāgatabalāni prajñāyante, vaiśāradyāni prajñāyante, pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:458_7: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, anāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ prajñāyate, pratyekabodhiṃ prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā prajñāyate, sarvākārajñatā prajñāyate, srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante, sakṛdāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:459_1: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.

S06sspp2_4u:462_0: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:463_0: adhyatmaśūnyatā, bahirdhāśūnyatā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, śūnyatāśūnyatā, mahāśūnyatā, paramārthaśūnyatā, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā, atyantaśūnyatā, anavarāgraśūnyatā, anavakāraśūnyatā, prakṛtiśūnyatā, sarvadharmaśūnyatā, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā, anupalambhaśūnyatā, [ŚsP_II-4_132] abhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:464_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,

S06sspp2_4u:467_2: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, atyantaśūnyatā prajñāyate, anavarāgraśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:467_3: anavakāraśūnyatā prajñāyate, prakṛtiśūnyatā prajñāyate, sarvadharmaśūnyatā prajñāyate,

S06sspp2_4u:468_1: āryasatyāni prajñāyante, dhyānāni prajñāyante, apramāṇāni prajñāyante, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:468_4: abhijñāḥ prajñāyante, samādhayaḥ prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante, tathāgatabalāni prajñāyante, vaiśāradyāni prajñāyante, pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:468_6: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, anāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ prajñāyate, pratyekabodhiṃ prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā prajñāyate, sarvākārajñatā prajñāyate, srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante, sakṛdāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:469_1: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sahasracūḍikā lokadhātuḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:469_2: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:470_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:471_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:471_1: yo syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt,
S06sspp2_4u:471_2: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vacanāya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:471_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra [ŚsP_II-4_134] kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
S06sspp2_4u:471_9: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:471_10: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:471_11: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06sspp2_4u:472_0: katame ca te kauśikānāsrava dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:474_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvaviharasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ santadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:474_3: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:474_4: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt.
S06sspp2_4u:474_6: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

S06sspp2_4u:499_0: smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante, samyakprahāṇāni prajñāyante, ṛddhipādāḥ prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:499_1: āryasatyāni prajñāyante, dhyānāni prajñāyante, apramāṇāni prajñāyante, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:499_4: abhijñāḥ prajñāyante, samādhayaḥ prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante, daśatathāgatabalāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:499_5: vaiśāradyāni prajñāyante, pratisamvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:499_7: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, anāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ prajñāyate, pratyekabodhiṃ prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā prajñāyate, sarvākārajñatā prajñayate, srotaāpannaḥ prajñāyante, sakṛdāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:500_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kecij jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet [ŚsP_II-4_141] pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭchāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:500_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:502_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:502_2: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:502_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:502_8: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:502_9: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:503_0: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:505_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā nopadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:505_1: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:505_2: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:505_3: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:505_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:506_2: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:506_8: ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:506_10: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:506_13: bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:506_16: abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, atapā deyāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,

S06sspp2_4u:529_4: abhijñāḥ prajñāyante, samādhayaḥ prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante, tathāgatabalāni prajñāyante, vaiśāradyāni prajñāyante, pratisaṃvidaḥ prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate, āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:529_6: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, anāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ prajñāyate, pratyekabodhiṃ prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā prajñāyate, sarvākārajñatā prajñāyate, srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante, sakṛdāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, [ŚsP_II-4_148] anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:529_7: arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:530_1: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladtihitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturḥv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhapayet pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:530_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:532_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:532_1: yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ likhitvā parebhyo dadyāt,
S06sspp2_4u:532_2: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:532_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:532_4: yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
S06sspp2_4u:532_10: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:532_11: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:532_12: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:533_0: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:535_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthanāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipadaḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ [ŚsP_II-4_149] śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:535_1: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharma vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:535_2: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:535_3: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:535_4: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:535_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:536_2: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:536_8: ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:536_10: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:536_13: bṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttabṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,

S06sspp2_4u:538_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā prajñāyate, bahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_4u:538_1: śūnyatāśūnyatā prajñāyate, mahāśūnyatā prajñāyate, paramārthaśūnyatā prajñāyate,

S06sspp2_4u:561_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅganadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:561_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:563_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:563_2: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:563_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
S06sspp2_4u:563_9: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:563_10: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:563_11: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06sspp2_4u:564_0: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:566_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:566_1: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:566_2: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:566_3: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:566_4: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

S06sspp2_4u:568_2: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:568_8: ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,

S06sspp2_4u:594_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:594_2: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā.
S06sspp2_4u:594_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
S06sspp2_4u:594_9: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ [ŚsP_II-4_163] prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ḥa,
S06sspp2_4u:594_10: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:594_11: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:595_0: katame te kauśikānāsrava dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:597_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:597_1: mahāmaitri mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:597_2: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:597_3: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:597_4: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:597_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:598_2: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:598_8: ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:598_10: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,

S06sspp2_4u:624_9: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:624_10: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:624_11: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:625_0: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:627_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukāni sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:627_1: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:627_2: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:627_3: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:627_4: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

S06sspp2_4u:628_2: yāmā devāḥ prajñāyante, tuṣitā devāḥ prajñāyante, nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:628_8: ābhā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttābhā devāḥ prajñāyante,

S06sspp2_4u:653_7: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya,
S06sspp2_4u:654_0: yan na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:654_1: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvyacaritayā dhyānapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:654_2: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā vīryapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati ādhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:654_3: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvyacaritayā kṣāntipāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati ādhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:654_4: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā śīlapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati ādhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:654_5: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvyacaritayā dānapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:655_0: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_1: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_2: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_3: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_4: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā mahāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_5: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā paramārthaśūnyatāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_178] yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_6: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_7: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_8: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā atyantasunyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_9: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_10: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā anavakāraśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_11: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_12: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_13: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_14: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā anupalambhaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_15: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā abhāvaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_16: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:655_17: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:656_0: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā smṛtyupasthānani yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_1: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā samyakprahāṇāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_2: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā ṛddhipādāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_3: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā indriyāṇi yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_4: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā balāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_5: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā bodhyaṅgāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_6: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā āryāṣtāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_7: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā āryasatyāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_8: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā dhyānāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_9: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā apramāṇāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_10: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā ārūpyasamāpattīr yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_11: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā aṣṭau vimokṣān yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_12: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_13: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_14: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā abhijñāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_15: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā samādhīn yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_16: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā dhāraṇīmukhāni [ŚsP_II-4_179] yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_17: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā tathāgatabalāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_18: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā vaiśāradyāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_19: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā pratisaṃvido yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_20: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā mahākaruṇāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_21: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā āveṇikabuddhadharmān yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_22: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā sarvajñatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_23: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā mārgākārajñatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:656_24: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā sarvākārajñatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:657_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anena paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati prabhāvayiṣyati vivariṣyati vibhajiṣyaty uttarīkariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:657_3: na prajñāpāramitādvayeṇa draṣṭavyā na dvayena na nimittato nāyuhato nāniryūhataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:657_4: notkṣepato na prakṣepataḥ, na saṃkreśato na vyavadānato notpādato na nirodhataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:657_5: na grahato nāgrahato nodgrahato notsargato na sthānato nāsthānato na bhūtato nābhūtataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:657_6: na yogato nāyogato na śleṣmato nāśleṣmato na pratyayato nāpratyayato na dharmato nādharmataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:657_7: na tathāgatato nātathāgatato na bhūtakoṭīto nābhūtakoṭītaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:657_8: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:658_0: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati vicariṣyati bhajiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:658_2: eyaṃ cāsya upadekṣyati, na tv eva ya ātmanaikopagṛhīyāt paryavāpnuyād ādhārayed dhārayed vācayed yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt.
S06sspp2_4u:659_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ ca parasmai vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati prajñāpayiṣyati sthāpayiṣyati vicariṣyati bhajiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:659_3: arthaṃ cāsya upadekṣyaty ayam eva sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:660_0: śakra āha: evaṃ khalu bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:661_1: bhagavān āha: evaṃ khlu kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā sārthā savyañjanā.
S06sspp2_4u:661_2: evam upadiśan punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāmānena puṇyaskandhena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:662_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pūrvasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthaṃ savyañjanam ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:662_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:663_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:663_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:664_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paścimāyāṃ diśy aprameyāsakhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyayeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:664_1: tat kasya [ŚsP_II-4_181] hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:665_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā uttarasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

S06sspp2_4u:666_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jivaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣid deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttanīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
