S06sspp2_4u:669_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paścimottarasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajmpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ punyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:669_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhoteyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:670_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā adhastād diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyayeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ pṃyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:670_1: tat kasya hetoh? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ [ŚsP_II-4_183] samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:671_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upariṣṭād diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryān mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:671_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:672_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:673_0: yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parasmai vistareṇācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayet prajñāpayet prasthāpayed vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:673_1: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:674_0: dānaṃ datata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi idaṃ dānaṃ dadāmy asmai dānaṃ dadāmi tasyaivaṃ dānaṃ dadato dānam eva sthāsyati na dānapāramitā upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:674_1: śīlaṃ rakṣata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmīdaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmi tasyaivaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlam eva sthāsyati na śīlapāramitā upalabhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:674_2: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntibhāvayāmīmāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:674_3: tasyaivaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayataḥ kṣāntir eva sthāsyati na kṣāntipāramitām upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:674_4: vīryam ārabhamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhe asyārthāya vīryam ārabhe tasyaivaṃ vīryam ārabhamānasya vīryam eva sthāsyati na vīryapāramitā [ŚsP_II-4_184] upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:674_5: dhyānāni samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadya imāni dhyānāni samāpadyetasyaivaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānāny eva sthāsyati na dhyānapāramitā upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:674_6: prajñāṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmīmāṃ bhāvayāmi tasyaivaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñaiva sthāsyati na prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:675_0: evaṃ khalu kauśikopalambhacaritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na dānapāramitā paripūryate na śīlapāramitā paripūryate na kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate na vīryapāramitā paripūryate na dhyānapāramitā paripūryate na prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.
S06sspp2_4u:676_0: śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:677_0: bhagavān āha: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat na dāyakam upalabhate na dānaṃ pratigrāhakam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:677_1: na śīlaṃ rakṣan na śīlaṃ na śīlasamādānam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:677_2: na kṣāntiṃ bhāvayan na kṣāntiṃ rakṣanti bhāvanām upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:677_3: na vīryam ārabhamāṇe na vīryāraṃbham upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:677_6: evaṃ carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūryate prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.
S06sspp2_4u:678_0: evaṃ khalu kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā abudhyamānasya prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanām upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:678_1: evam abudhyamānasya dhyānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:678_2: evam abudhyamānasya vīryapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:678_3: evam abudhyamānasya kṣāntipāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:678_4: evam abudhyamānasya śīlapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:678_5: evam abudhyamānasya [ŚsP_II-4_185] dānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā.
S06sspp2_4u:678_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? bhaviṣyanti kauśikānāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ye bodhisattvayānikebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:678_7: tatra ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarā yaiḥ samyaksaṃbodhir ye saṃprasthitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:678_8: te tāṃ prativarṇikāṃ śrutvā mārgāṃ praṇakṣanti teṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanā vistareṇopadiṣṭavyā.
S06sspp2_4u:679_1: śakra āha: katamā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikā?
S06sspp2_4u:680_0: bhagavān āha: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāma iti,
S06sspp2_4u:681_0: śakra āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro yā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06sspp2_4u:682_0: bhagavān āha: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:682_3: yad uta rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:682_5: rūpam anātmety upadekṣyanti, rūpam aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:683_0: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:683_3: rūpam anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante, rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:683_6: rūpam anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:684_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:684_5: yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te vedanām anityeti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:684_11: vedanām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ vedanām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:685_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:685_5: yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, [ŚsP_II-4_186] te saṃjñām anityeti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:685_11: saṃjñām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ saṃjñām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:686_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti, ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti.
S06sspp2_4u:686_5: yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te saṃskārān anityā iti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:686_11: saṃskārān anātmāna iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ saṃskārān aśubhā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:687_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:687_12: vijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:688_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:688_11: cakṣur anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, cakṣur aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:689_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:689_12: śrotram aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:690_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:690_12: ghrāṇam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:691_0: jihvām anityety upadekṣyanti, jihvāṃ duḥkhety upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:691_3: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:691_4: te jihvām anityeti gaveṣiṣyante jihvāṃ duḥkheti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:691_8: jihvāṃ duḥkheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, jihvām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, jihvām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:692_2: kāyam anātmety upadekṣyanti, kāyam aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:692_3: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:692_6: kāyam anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante, kāyam aśubha iti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:692_9: kāyam anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, kāyam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:693_3: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:693_9: mano 'nātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, mano 'śubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:694_2: rūpam anātmety upadekṣyanti, rūpam aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:694_3: evaṃ ca [ŚsP_II-4_188] vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:694_6: rūpam anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante, rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:694_9: rūpam anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:695_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:695_11: śabdam anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, śabdam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:696_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:696_12: gandham aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:697_2: rasam anātmety upadekṣyanti, rasam aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:697_3: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:697_6: rasam anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante, rasam aśubha iti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:697_9: rasam anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, rasam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:698_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:698_12: sparśam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:699_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:699_12: dharmān aśubhā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:700_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:700_12: cakṣurvijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:701_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:701_12: śrotravijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:702_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:702_12: ghrāṇavijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:703_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:703_12: jihvāvijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:704_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:704_12: kāyavijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikayāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:705_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:705_12: manovijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:706_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa [ŚsP_II-4_191] prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:706_12: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:707_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:707_12: śrotrasaṃsparśam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:708_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:708_12: ghrāṇasaṃsparśam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:709_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:709_12: jihvāsaṃsparśam aśubha [ŚsP_II-4_192] iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:710_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:710_12: kāyasaṃsparśam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:711_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:711_12: manaḥsaṃsparśam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:712_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,

S06sspp2_4u:775_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:776_5: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:777_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:778_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:779_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:780_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:781_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:782_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:782_12: srotaāpattiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:783_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati [ŚsP_II-4_212] sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:783_12: sakṛdāgāmiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:784_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:784_12: anāgāmiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:785_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:785_12: arhattvam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:786_4: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:786_5: yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te pratyekabodhim anityeti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:786_11: pratyekabodhim anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ pratyekabodhim aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:787_5: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:787_6: yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te mārgākārajñatām anityeti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:787_12: mārgākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ mārgākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:788_0: sarvākārajñatām anityety, upadekṣyanti, sarvākārajñatāṃ duḥkhety upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:788_3: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:788_4: yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te sarvākārajñatām anityeti gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:788_10: sarvākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:789_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upaviśanti upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:789_2: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:789_3: dvitīyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:789_4: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:789_5: dvitīyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:789_6: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra vīryapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:789_7: dvitīyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:789_8: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntipāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:789_9: dvitīyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau [ŚsP_II-4_214] ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:789_10: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra śīlapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:789_11: dvitīyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:789_12: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:789_13: dvitīyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:790_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:790_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ kulaputra prajñāīpāramitāṃ bhāvayan śrāvakabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi.
S06sspp2_4u:791_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanti,
S06sspp2_4u:791_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan bodhisattvanyāmam avakramiṣyāmy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilapsyase,
S06sspp2_4u:791_2: sattvam anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabhya bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyasi tāṃ tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan naivam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:792_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:792_1: yaḥ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'prameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:792_2: evam upadiśantas teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:793_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:793_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_215] samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat prathamacittotpādam upādāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:793_2: yāvad anupādhiśeṣāṃ nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāṃ tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evam upadiśantas te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:794_1: śakra āha: katham upadiśanto bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06sspp2_4u:795_0: bhagavān āha: iha kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:795_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca rūpam anityam iti samanupaśyaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:795_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ svabhāvaśūnyaṃ yo rūpasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhūvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā na tatra rūpaṃ nitya iti vā anityam iti copalabhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:795_4: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bbaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:795_5: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:796_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:796_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityeti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:796_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? vedanāsvabhāvena śūnyāyā vedanāyāḥ svabhāva so 'bhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā tatra na vedanā nityeti copalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:796_3: vedanaiva tatra na samvidyate nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:796_4: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:797_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:797_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca saṃjñām anityeti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:797_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? saṃjñāsvabhāvena śūnyāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na tatra saṃjñā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:797_4: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vābhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:797_5: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:798_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:798_2: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca saṃskārān anityā iti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:798_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? saṃskārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvā yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā tatra na saṃskārā nityā iti vā anityā iti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:798_5: kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:798_6: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:799_0: punar aparaṃ. kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:799_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca vijñānam anityam iti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:799_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? vijñānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ yo vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ so bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā tatra na vijñānaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:799_4: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:799_5: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:800_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:800_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca cakṣur anityam iti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:800_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? cakṣuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaś cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā tatra na cakṣur nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:800_4: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:800_5: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:801_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:801_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca śrotram anityam iti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:801_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? śrotraṃ svabhāvena śūnyo yaś śrotrasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā tatra na śrotraṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:801_4: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:801_5: evam upadiśantaḥ [ŚsP_II-4_217] kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:802_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:802_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca ghrāṇam anityam iti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:802_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? ghrāṇasvabhāvena śunyā yo ghrāṇasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā tatra na ghrāṇaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:802_4: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:802_5: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:803_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:803_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca jihvām anityam iti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:803_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? jihvā svabhāvena śūnyā yo jihvāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bbāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na jihvā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:803_4: kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:803_5: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:804_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:804_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca kāyam anityam iti samanupaśya.
S06sspp2_4u:804_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? kāyaḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ kāyasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,

S06sspp2_4u:901_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca kaṃ cid dharmaṃ samatikramiṣyasi sā kvacid dharme pratiṣṭhāsyati.
S06sspp2_4u:901_2: tat kasya [ŚsP_II-4_244] hetoh? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saddharmo na saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ samatikramitavyo yatra vā pratiṣṭhātavyam.
S06sspp2_4u:901_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvo na śūnyā yaś ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na kaścid dharma āyūhitavyo vā niryūhitavyo vā utpādayitavyo vā nirodhayitavyo vā,
S06sspp2_4u:901_4: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:901_5: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā artham upadeṣṭavyo evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:901_6: na tv eva te paurvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:902_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kascid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:902_2: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:904_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:904_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:904_2: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
S06sspp2_4u:904_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:905_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvipakāḥ sattvā yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:905_1: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:907_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:907_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:907_2: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ vadet.
S06sspp2_4u:907_3: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_245] pratipadyasva.
S06sspp2_4u:907_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.

S06sspp2_4u:1024_3: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_262] prajñāpāramitāṃ pratipatsyase.
S06sspp2_4u:1024_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām avaivartyabhūmiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1025_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās tān sarva anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā bhaveyus tebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśet,
S06sspp2_4u:1025_2: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed,
S06sspp2_4u:1025_3: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
S06sspp2_4u:1025_10: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1026_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā anuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye saṃprasthitā kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās te sarva anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā bhaveyus tebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
S06sspp2_4u:1026_1: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase.
S06sspp2_4u:1026_7: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1027_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye [ŚsP_II-4_263] saṃprasthitāyai yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās te sarva anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā bhaveyus tebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed,
S06sspp2_4u:1027_1: evaṃ ca yaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva,
S06sspp2_4u:1027_2: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase,
S06sspp2_4u:1027_8: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1028_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās te sarva anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā bhaveyus tebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo yistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet.
S06sspp2_4u:1028_1: evaṃ ca vadet, ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
S06sspp2_4u:1028_2: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase,
S06sspp2_4u:1028_8: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1029_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarva anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā bhaveyus tebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśet,
S06sspp2_4u:1029_1: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet.
S06sspp2_4u:1029_2: evaṃ ca vadet, ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya [ŚsP_II-4_264] vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
S06sspp2_4u:1029_3: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase,
S06sspp2_4u:1029_9: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1030_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā,
S06sspp2_4u:1030_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarva anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā bhaveyus tebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1030_2: kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:1030_3: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
S06sspp2_4u:1030_4: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase.
S06sspp2_4u:1030_10: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1031_1: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:1031_2: tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipraṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyeyam iti,
S06sspp2_4u:1031_3: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1031_5: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1032_1: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyaṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadised deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipraṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
S06sspp2_4u:1032_2: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1032_4: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:1032_5: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1033_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
S06sspp2_4u:1033_1: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:1033_2: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1034_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśet,
S06sspp2_4u:1034_1: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet.
S06sspp2_4u:1034_2: tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyam iti,
S06sspp2_4u:1034_3: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:1034_4: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1035_1: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpārāmitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet.
S06sspp2_4u:1035_2: tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ ca vaded ehi kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
S06sspp2_4u:1035_3: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed,
S06sspp2_4u:1035_4: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1036_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06sspp2_4u:1036_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1036_2: kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ punyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1036_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? avaivartikebhyo hi bodhisattvebhyo nānyārthaṃ dharmam upadeṣṭavyo niyatā hi te saṃbodhi parāyaṇānate bhuyo vivartittite anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbodher ayam abhū kaścic citaḥ saṃsārāt mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitaś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:1037_1: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:1037_2: yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttārāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1038_0: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā adhyātmaśūnyatāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1039_0: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā smṛtyupasthāneṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1040_0: te khalu punar bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmasaṃgrahaś cāmiṣasaṃgraheṇaṃ cānuś cānugṛhūnto bahutaraṃ te kulaputra kuladuhitaraś ca puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:1040_1: na tv eva te paurvakāḥ kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:1040_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? evaṃ tvena tad bhagavan bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:1043_1: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
S06sspp2_4u:1043_2: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyā utsāhaṃ dadāsi bodhisattvānām ugṛhīṣve anupārayasi,
S06sspp2_4u:1043_3: evam eṣa tvayā kauśika karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sattvānām anugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām [ŚsP_II-4_269] anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv utsāhaṃ dadhātu dharmām iṣānugraheṇa ca bodhisattvān anugṛhātv anuparipārayatu.
S06sspp2_4u:1043_4: tat kasya hetoh? ataḥ prasabohi kauśika bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghāḥ yad uta bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ yadi ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittan notpādayan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣeta ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:1045_0: smṛtyupasthāneṣu, samyakprahāṇeṣu, ṛddhipādeṣu, indriyeṣu, baleṣu, bodhyaṅgeṣu, āryāṣṭāṅge marge, āryasatyeṣu, dhyāneṣu, apramāṇeṣu, ārūpyasamāpattiṣu, aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu, navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu,
S06sspp2_4u:1045_2: abhijñāsu, samādhiṣu, dhāraṇīmukheṣu, tathāgatabaleṣu, vaiśāradyeṣu, pratisaṃvitsu, mahāmaitryāṃ, mahākaruṇāyāṃ, aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
S06sspp2_4u:1045_3: nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na pratyekabuddhā prajñāparan na śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1045_4: yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu danapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:1047_0: smṛtyupasthāneṣu, samyakprahāṇeṣu, ṛddhipādeṣu, indriyeṣu, baleṣu, bodhyaṅgeṣu, āryāṣṭāṅge marge, āryasatyeṣu, dhyāneṣu, apramāṇeṣu, ārūpyasamāpattiṣu, aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu, navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu,
S06sspp2_4u:1047_2: abhijñāsu, samādhiṣu, dhāraṇīmukheṣu, tathāgatabaleṣu, vaiśāradyeṣu, pratisaṃvitsu, mahāmaitryāṃ, mahākaruṇāyāṃ, [ŚsP_II-4_270] aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu.
S06sspp2_4u:1048_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaiḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu naraka ucchidyante tiryagyoni ucchidyante yamaloka ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_4u:1048_2: āsurāś ca kāyā parihīyante divyāṃs ca kāyā abhivartante,
S06sspp2_4u:1051_11: anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:1052_22: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
